GK19gp01-11u:458: karṇābhyarṇa-gatā iva sphuṭam amūn dhunvanti tad-dhyāyinaḥ //JGc_1,1.36// [śārdūlā]

GK19gp01-11u:488: yatas tatratyaṃ sarvam eva citram iti duṣpratyāyatāṃ prāpnoti / yeṣu hi-

GK19gp01-11u:502: harer dhyāyan nānā bhavati kavi-cittaṃ muhur api //
GK19gp01-11u:505: sakhyāṃ sañcarati śrutaṃ ca caritaṃ sarva-śrutaṃ laṅghati /

GK19gp01-11u:521: [65] tasmād asāmpratāya tu sāmpratāya mad-vidhāya svaṃ varṇayituṃ kim uta nirvarṇayitum-
GK19gp01-11u:526: [66] tad evam ānanda-satra-patrādi-sthitānām upari sāndra-śākhābhir alakṣya-talānām
GK19gp01-11u:529: akṣāmaṃ sapta-kakṣyārāmaṃ dhāma nikāmaṃ dhāma vistārayan netrāṇi vistārayati /

GK19gp01-11u:541: teṣāṃ tatra vasanti sevakatayā kṛṣṇāya tṛṣṇā-juṣāṃ
GK19gp01-11u:543: netraṃ śrotraṃ cittam apy anyad anyat

GK19gp01-11u:557: [68] athānyad api kim api vibhāvya sambhāvyate /
GK19gp01-11u:558: tad yadi satām anubhavam apy anubhavitā,
GK19gp01-11u:560: na cen navya-kāvyatā tu na vyabhicaritā /
GK19gp01-11u:561: athavā, tathāpi yat kiñcid api teṣāṃ vāñchitaṃ syād eveti sarva añcitam eva manyāmahe /
GK19gp01-11u:563: yathā-atha gopāvāsābhyantare tādṛśām eva sabhyānāṃ labhyā sabhāvalir upalabhyate,
GK19gp01-11u:565: yeṣāṃ panthānaḥ kila kiñjalka-valaja-paryantāḥ samastād vibhrājante,
GK19gp01-11u:566: yatra ca parasparam abhimukhāḥ sumukhā mahāntas te gṛhā mithaḥ pṛthula-śobhā loka-spṛhā iva vimṛśya dṛśyante,
GK19gp01-11u:567: yatra ca siṃha-saṃhananānāṃ puruṣa-siṃhānāṃ niścalāṅghrīṇi mahā-siṃhāsanāni vicitratayā netrāṇāṃ paribṛṃhaṇatām aṃhante,
GK19gp01-11u:568: yatra ca parāvara-kakṣyā-vāsi-loka-lakṣāṇi samam eva samakṣāṇi santi,
GK19gp01-11u:570: yatra caikatrāsīnānām anyatrāpi rūpaka-kāvya iva pratirūpāṇi rūpāṇi pratīyante-na ca tāni kevalāni,
GK19gp01-11u:571: api tu pratidhvanayaś ca dhvani-kāvya iva dhvanitayā vibhāvyante,
GK19gp01-11u:572: yataḥ svacchāntaḥ-karaṇā mahāntaḥ khalu para-guṇāntarāṇy api āyacchantīti prathitiḥ prathīyasī;
GK19gp01-11u:573: yadā ca tathā prathīyante vibhāvyante ca,

GK19gp01-11u:577: tadā tūtsavānām api mahān utsavaḥ sphurati /
GK19gp01-11u:578: [70] atha sabhā-valayam antarā ca kakṣyā-pañcakatayā labdha-bodhaḥ sarva-cittāvarodhaḥ sa tu vraja-nṛpāvarodhaḥ samudbhrājate /

GK19gp01-11u:616: [79] evaṃ śrī-balarāmasya rāma-ghaṭṭākhya-nija-krīḍā-vana-gamanaṃ ca tala-vartmanaiva vartate,
GK19gp01-11u:618: [80] tām etām uparigatāṃ śrīmad-vrajeśvara-purīṃ pari tu ślokāḥ parigīyante-

GK19gp01-11u:706: geheśi tvaṃ carita-sukṛtā hanta vatsas tvad-agre

GK19gp01-11u:718: tasya nija-vraja-loka-cakrasya dantavakraṃ hatavatā śrī-bhagavatā tatra vigata-sarva-śoke
GK19gp01-11u:719: goloke punar api saṃśleṣaḥ sādhita iti campū-dvayasya pratisampūrti-vakṣyamāṇa-sapramāṇa-kathā-lakṣyatayā
GK19gp01-11u:721: siddhe tatra tu saṃśleṣe kutrāpi rātriviśeṣe śeṣe golokādvandva-mahendra-dvāri hāri dundubhi-dvandvam unnanāda /
GK19gp01-11u:727: atha nija-nija-vṛndinaḥ sūta-māgadha-vandinaḥ śrīman-nanda-rāja-pura-virājamāna-bṛṃhita-siṃha-dvāri sarvordhvaṃ vindamānāṃ candra-śālikām adhiruhya,
GK19gp01-11u:729: svacchandatayā naṭanta ivāparyantaṃ paṭhantaḥ samantād eva jana-sandoham ānanda-dohaṃ lambhayāmāsuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:731: [3] tadā muhur api harer avadāna-gānato labdha-toṣa-poṣā ghoṣādhipati-dampati-mukhāḥ parama-sukhād atiśasta-vastrālaṅkāra-bhāraṃ tebhyaḥ svayam īhayā vihāpayāmāsuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:732: kintu śravaṇe' pi tṛptir na kptim avāpa,
GK19gp01-11u:733: kathaṃ vā tatrāvaśyam eva vaśanīyā sātiḥ sātim āsīdatu?
GK19gp01-11u:734: tad anu ca samudbhūta-prema-rasa-rāśir vraja-vāri-rāśiḥ svayam eva nija-nija-hṛdayaṅgama-vraja-maṅgala-śyāmalāṅga-saṅgāna-taraṅga-saṅgha-saṅgitayā
GK19gp01-11u:736: tatra ca, gīyamānatayā sannidhīyamānasya tadīya-yaśasaś candramasaḥ samatām anumimīmahe /
GK19gp01-11u:737: [4] yadā tu śrīla-gopāla-līlā-gāna-grahilā mahilā gātum ārabdhās tadā sarva eva satṛṣṇās tūṣṇīm āsan,
GK19gp01-11u:739: yad eva gānaṃ vaidagdhī-digdha-kaṅkanādi-jhaṅkārālaṅkṛta-manthāna-nirghoṣaḥ svara-tālādi-dānam iva kurvāṇaḥ sva-poṣaṃ pupoṣa /
GK19gp01-11u:741: sarvataḥ-sāreṇa sapramāṇa-varṇayitavyānusāreṇāpagatāpara-pati-bhramāḥ sarvā eva vraja-ramā māravāṇa-dalita-marmāṇas tad-eka-sevā-
GK19gp01-11u:742: dharmyeṣu nija-nija-harmyeṣu samam eva labdhāgamanaṃ tam ekam eva ramaṇaṃ ramaṇatāṃ
GK19gp01-11u:743: gamayamānā na virāmam icchantīti sakhībhir eva prābhātikarāgamaya-gāna-narmaṇā tasmād uparamayāmāsire /
GK19gp01-11u:746: bāhū viślathitau ślathīkṛtam uro vaktraṃ daracyāvitaṃ,
GK19gp01-11u:747: talpād utthitam ekadā vinimayenālambya yatnān muhuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:748: yābhyāṃ sparśasukhāgraho' pi damitas tābhyāṃ haripreyasī

GK19gp01-11u:1436: yayoś ca savyāpasavyataḥ sarve vrajasthāḥ sūtādiṣu sphurad-arhad-avasthā-viśiṣṭam upaviṣṭā vistīrṇatāsāṅga-prāṅgaṇe tu pare śiṣṭāḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1440: dṛṣṭiṃ pīyūṣa-vṛṣṭiṃ vinidadhad asakṛt kṛṣṇa-vaktre sa-tṛṣṇaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:1441: śrīmān goloka-rājaḥ sa-sadasi dadṛśe rājamānaḥ prajābhiḥ //JGc_1,3.4//
GK19gp01-11u:1445: śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ samayātra sāmpratam api pratyakṣaval lakṣyate //
GK19gp01-11u:1446: [7] tatra ca tasya varṇādikam evaṃ varṇyate-
GK19gp01-11u:1447: śyāme śyāma-daśām avāpa sahasā śoṇe tathā śoṇatāṃ
GK19gp01-11u:1448: pīte rociṣi pīta-dhāma vividhe vaividhyam āgād iti /
GK19gp01-11u:1449: aṅgopāṅga-rucā harer jana-dṛśāṃ vīthir gatā tat-kṣaṇān
GK19gp01-11u:1452: candro' yaṃ śyāma eṣa prthama-jaladharaḥ kāntibhir viśva-dīpaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:1453: śobhante vidyutas tā iha sapadi jahatyātma-sattām amūs tu /
GK19gp01-11u:1454: nakṣatrāṇīha līnāny api bata kumate no nabhaḥ sā sabhāsāv
GK19gp01-11u:1455: ity anyonyaṃ vinodād vivadanam udabhūt tatra śaśvat kavīnām //JGc_1,3.7//
GK19gp01-11u:1460: sphurati sakhe kim iyaṃ sabhā navāsti //JGc_1,3.8//
GK19gp01-11u:1461: [9] athātma-sthāne yuktaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-rāmābhyāṃ prayuktaḥ prasiddha-nāmā śrīdāmā śrībhājaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:1462: vraja-rājam āvedya sadyaḥ pura-madhyam āsādya kṛtī śrī-vrajarājñī-prabhṛtir bahiḥ
GK19gp01-11u:1463: kuṭṭimāt kiñcid unnata-kuṭṭimam anu maryādām aṃśam apy aticarya sphuṭam upary upari
GK19gp01-11u:1465: samayā samānīya pratīhāraṃ sapratīhāraṃ praṇīya dṛg-bhaṅgi-kalayā tāsām antaḥ-sabhā-saṅgitām
GK19gp01-11u:1467: [10] yatra śrīmatāṃ mitrāṇāṃ saṅgatau madhumaṅgalo' pi raṅga iva tat-tat-prasaṅgena narma-bhaṅgibhiḥ śarma dātum aṅgīkurvann iva niviveśa /
GK19gp01-11u:1473: [12] atha rājñā vrajasya madhuram ājñāpyate sma-“aye madhukaṇṭha-snigdhakaṇṭhau/
GK19gp01-11u:1478: [14] vrajarāja uvāca-“bhavantu sarvajñāv iti vijñāpanāyāsmadīya-kathābhibhir evāsmān vismāyayetām /“
GK19gp01-11u:1482: [16] vrajarāja uvāca-“dinam ekam ekam antarā pratyekam api tat-tad-rūpatām āpnotu /
GK19gp01-11u:1483: prakrāntā punar jyāyān eva jyāyān vidhīyate /“
GK19gp01-11u:1484: [17] tataś ca dhṛtotkaṇṭhaḥ sapadi madhukaṇṭhaḥ kṛtāñjalitayā nāndīṃ paṭhann akhilam ānandayati sma / yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:1485: śrīmān yo bhagavān svayaṃ vijayate brahmā surarṣir mahān
GK19gp01-11u:1486: vyāsas tat-prabhavaḥ parīkṣid api yāv ugraśravaḥ-śaunakau /
GK19gp01-11u:1493: so' yaṃ vaktā sarvam uccair didhinva //JGc_1,3.11//
GK19gp01-11u:1494: [18] iti prakāre labdha-sāre punar madhukaṇṭhaḥ sotkaṇṭhaṃ gāyan nṛtyan tat-tad-bhāvābhinayaṃ praṇayan kathām abhyādade /
GK19gp01-11u:1496: [19] yathā-atha sarva-śruti-purāṇādi-kṛta-praśaṃsasya vṛṣṇi-vaṃśasya vataṃsaḥ śrī-devamīḍha-nāmā parama-guṇa-dhāmā madhurāmadhyāsāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:1500: tayoś ca krameṇa yathāvad āhvayaṃ putra-dvayaṃ prathamaṃ babhūva śūraḥ parjanya iti /
GK19gp01-11u:1502: śrīmān parjanyas tu mātṛvad varṇa-saṅkaraḥ iti nyāyena vaiśyatām evāviśya gavām evaiśyaṃ vaśyaṃ cakāra /
GK19gp01-11u:1504: sa cāyaṃ bālyād eva brāhmaṇa-darśaṃ pūjayati,
GK19gp01-11u:1511: ābhīra-viśeṣatayā sadbhir udīraṇād eṣa hi viśeṣaṃ bhajate sma /
GK19gp01-11u:1514: ābhīro' mbaṣṭa-kanyāyām āyogavyāṃ tu dhigvaṇaḥ //[Manu 10.15] iti /
GK19gp01-11u:1515: ambaṣṭhas tu viśaḥ putryāṃ brāhmaṇāj jāta ucyate iti cānyatra /
GK19gp01-11u:1516: ataḥ pādme sṛṣṭi-khaṇḍādau yajñaṃ kurvatā brahmaṇāpy ābhīra-paryāya-gopa-kanyāyāḥ patnītvena svīkāraḥ prasiddhaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1517: eṣa eva ca gopa-vaṃśaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-līlāyāṃ saṃvalanam āpsyatīti /
GK19gp01-11u:1520: [21] atha snigdhakaṇṭhena cāntaś cintitam-evam api kecid aho eṣāṃ dvijatāyāṃ sandeham api dehayisyanti /
GK19gp01-11u:1521: ye khalu śrīmad-bhāgavate kuru dvijāti-saṃskāram [10.8.10] iti gargaṃ prati śrī-vrajarāja-vacane,
GK19gp01-11u:1522: vaiśyas tu vārtayā jīvet ity ārabhya,
GK19gp01-11u:1524: vārtā caturvidhā tatra vayaṃ go-vṛttayo' niśam //[BhP 10.24.20-21]
GK19gp01-11u:1527: vyatirekatas tu dharma-rāja-caratāyām api vidurasya śūdra-garbhodbhavatayānyathā-vyavahāra-śravaṇe' py adhikaṃ viadhirāyiṣyante iti /
GK19gp01-11u:1529: [23] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-sa ca śrīmān parjanyaḥ saujanya-varyeṇārjitena nijaiśvaryeṇāpi vaiśyāntara-sādhāraṇyam atīyāya,
GK19gp01-11u:1531: yataḥ svāśrita-deśa-pālakatā-mānyatayā vadānyatayā kṣīra-vaibhava-plāvita-sarva-janatā-labdha-prādhānyatayā ca parjanya-sāmānyatām āpa ;
GK19gp01-11u:1539: yasya ca sarvair api kṛta-guṇanena guṇa-gaṇane vaśitāḥ sahasra-saṅkhyābhir apy anavasitā
GK19gp01-11u:1540: mātāmaha-mahā-vaṃśa-prabhavāḥ sarvathā prabhavante gopāḥ sopādhyāyāḥ svayam eva samāśritā babhūvuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1541: tat-sambandhāni ca vṛndaśaḥ yaṃ khalu śrīmad-ugrasenāgrīya-yadu-saṃsad-agraṇyas te samagra-guṇa-garimaṇy
GK19gp01-11u:1543: yasya ca preyasī sakala-guṇa-varīyasī varīyasīnām āsīt /
GK19gp01-11u:1544: yasya ca śrīmad-upanandādayaḥ pañca-nandanā jagad evānandayāmāsuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1545: [24] tathā ca vandinas tasya ślokaṃ ślokatām ānayanti-
GK19gp01-11u:1546: anyas tu jala-parjanyaḥ sukha-parjanya eṣa tu /
GK19gp01-11u:1547: sadā yo dhinute sṛṣṭair upanandādibhir janam //
GK19gp01-11u:1549: tad etan nādbhutaṃ sthūla-lakṣyatāṃ yad asau gataḥ //JGc_1,3.13//
GK19gp01-11u:1555: ity ākhyāḥ kurvatā pitrā nander arthaḥ sudaṇḍitaḥ //JGc_1,3.15//
GK19gp01-11u:1556: [25] tad evaṃ satīṣu sarva-sampattiṣu tasya putra-sampattis tu parama-ramaṇīyatām avāpa /
GK19gp01-11u:1558: tatrāpi madhyama-suta-sampattiḥ sutarām aiśvaryāṇām avicchinna-sampatti-paṅktim anu madhyama-sampattir iva /
GK19gp01-11u:1560: vayaṃ tu tasya madhya-sambadhyamānasya sarvānandanasya śrīmat-parjanya-nandanasya bālaka-paryāyeṇa tena pāṇḍu-tanayenopamānaṃ na manyāmahe /
GK19gp01-11u:1561: api ca paramodāreṣu ca sahodareṣu teṣu na kevalaṃ janmanā tāvan madhya-vartitayā so' yaṃ vartate /
GK19gp01-11u:1562: api tu sneha-sampadām āspadatayāpi na ca kevalaṃ teṣām kintu sarveṣām api /
GK19gp01-11u:1563: yena tasmin pitror apy adhikā sneharddhikāyā vardhiṣṇutā bhrātṝnām api sadā sukha-saṃvardhanī babhūva,
GK19gp01-11u:1565: na caitāvān udbhūtaḥ suguṇas tasminn udbhūtaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1566: [27] bhavati hi svayaṃ bhagavati tasya bhakti-viśeṣa-vyaktiḥ-yasyāsti bhaktir bhagavaty akiñcanā sarvair guṇais tatra samāsate surāḥ iti hi bhagavatī śrī-bhāgavata-gīr-devī /
GK19gp01-11u:1567: [28] tad etan madhukaṇṭhataḥ śrutvā śrīmad-upanandaḥ śrīmad-abhinandaṃ nīcair uvāca-vijñātā kathāṃ prakurvāṇasya kim asya para-hṛdaya-vijñatā
GK19gp01-11u:1568: [29] athābhinandas tad avadhārya sāścaryaṃ madhukaṇṭham uvāca-tatas tataḥ ?
GK19gp01-11u:1569: [30] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-tad evaṃ sati nāmnā sumukhena kenacana gopānāṃ mukhena tasmai parama-dhanyā kanyā dattā /
GK19gp01-11u:1570: yā khalu sva-guṇa-vaśīkṛta-svajanā yaśāṃsi dadāti śṛṇvantyaḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:1573: tataś ca tayoḥ sāmpratam eva dāmpatyena sarveṣām api sukha-sampattir ajāyata,
GK19gp01-11u:1575: [31] tad evam ānandita-sarva-janyu-vigata-manyuḥ parjanyaḥ sarvato dhanyaḥ svayam
GK19gp01-11u:1576: api bhūyaḥ sukham anubhūya cābhyāgārikatāyām abhyāgataṃ-manyaḥ śrī-govinda-padāravinda-bhajana-mātrānvitāṃ
GK19gp01-11u:1577: deha-yātrām abhīṣṭāṃ manyamānaḥ sarva-jyāyase jyāyase svaka-kula-tilakatāṃ dātuṃ
GK19gp01-11u:1580: [32] sa punaḥ pitur ājñām aṅgīkṛtya kṛta-kṛtyas tasyām eva śrī-vasudevādi-saṃvalita-mahānubhāvānāṃ
GK19gp01-11u:1581: sabhāyām āhūya sabhāvam utsaṅga-saṅginaṃ vidhāya madhyamam eva nijānujaṃ tena tilakena
GK19gp01-11u:1583: [33] atha tatrānuje saṅkucati sarvatra ca jane vismayaṃ sacamāne pitari ca rocamāna-locane sa covāca-mayedaṃ nāvicāram ācaritam,
GK19gp01-11u:1587: sā cātra yathā tathā na mad-vidhe /
GK19gp01-11u:1588: saiva ca khalu sarva-vaśīkāritāyāṃ svairitām arhati /
GK19gp01-11u:1589: [34] kiṃ ca, sarvāntaryāmy apy enam evorarīcarīkarīti /
GK19gp01-11u:1590: dṛśyatām asyāṃ bhāsamānāyāṃ sabhāyāṃ sarveṣāṃ netra-paṭalī-ṣaṭpadaval-līlāyamānā kevalam asya mukhaṃ kamalam iva saṃvalate /
GK19gp01-11u:1595: sphuṭa-dhvanir divam anu sādhu sādhv iti /
GK19gp01-11u:1599: śrīmad-upananda-nandanayos traya eva madhyamā iti ko' yaṃ madhyamaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1600: kīdṛśī vā tasya samañjasateti sodāharaṇam ucyatām /
GK19gp01-11u:1601: [36] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-ekaṃ tāvad bhavan-manaḥ-prahlannatā-samucitaṃ pravahlikā-padyam idam anavadyaṃ pūryatām /
GK19gp01-11u:1606: iti svayaṃ vetti na tena maitrīṃ
GK19gp01-11u:1608: [39] snigdhakaṇṭhaḥ sotkaṇṭhatayā śīghram eva sānandam uvāca-nanda eva iti /
GK19gp01-11u:1611: svenālpena guṇena vāñchati nije pūjā-sukhe bhūyasī
GK19gp01-11u:1612: loko yas tu mahīyasāpi khalu tenaivānyadīye sadā /
GK19gp01-11u:1613: so' yaṃ śrī-vrajarāja eva yad asau śūrāṅgajaṃ dhinvituṃ
GK19gp01-11u:1614: tat-tad-dhānim asoḍha sakhyam abhinnālpaṃ ca tasyāntaram //JGc_1,3.18//
GK19gp01-11u:1615: [41] tataś ca tad etan madhukaṇṭha-sūkta-sudhākaram āsādya ratnākara ivocchalad-aṅga-taraṅgas
GK19gp01-11u:1617: vā vitīrṇavān iti svayam api na bhidāṃ vidāmbabhūva /
GK19gp01-11u:1619: [43] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-tataḥ śrīmān asau dhanyaḥ parjanyaḥ śrī-govinda-padāravinda-bhajanāya
GK19gp01-11u:1620: vṛndāvanaṃ praviśan samāsata eva samasta-śāstra-sāraṃ pṛcchataḥ putrān upadideśa, yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:1621: kiṃ bhaya-mūlam adṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ śaraṇaṃ śrī-harer bhaktaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1622: kiṃ prārthyaṃ tad-bhaktiḥ kiṃ saukhyaṃ tat-para-prema //JGc_1,3.19// iti /
GK19gp01-11u:1623: [44] tad evaṃ saha-bhārye vṛndāvanaṃ gate tasminn ārye śrīmān upanandaḥ sva-nāmānurūpaṃ śrīman-nanda-vraja-mahendra-sabhāyām ayantrita-mantritayā sthitavān /
GK19gp01-11u:1625: so' pi mantra-miṣeṇa viśeṣeṇa tad-ājñām eva gṛhṇan sarvaṃ sarva-kālaṃ surājā prajā-kulaṃ pālayati sma /
GK19gp01-11u:1627: maryādāṃ pitur ayam āvad eva sarvāṃ
GK19gp01-11u:1628: dharmādir na vipadam eti yatra cārthaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1629: sampattir na punar abhūd amuṣya vaśyā
GK19gp01-11u:1631: [46] tad evaṃ sarva-samṛddhi-vṛddhi-siddhim āyāte rājanvati vraja-jana-jāte kalikāyamānā kācid utkalikā krameṇa vikāsam ayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:1632: sarveṣāṃ prāṇa-tulyasya nija-kulyasya rājñas tasya santatir na jāyata iti /
GK19gp01-11u:1633: kālātyaye cāśā-vyatyayāt sarvaṃ janam atīva kṛcchram ānarccha /
GK19gp01-11u:1635: śrīmad-vrajapati-jampatī tu prajāśāṃ pūrvata eva sandigdhi-digdhām api kurvāte sma,
GK19gp01-11u:1638: kathaṃ vā vidagdhayor api tayoḥ sandigdhatā jātā /
GK19gp01-11u:1641: [48] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-anuṣṭhāpitam api tat tan na pratiṣṭhām āsasāda /
GK19gp01-11u:1645: tat tad aśeṣa-sampattyor api dampatyo rahasi saṃvādo' yaṃ babhūva /
GK19gp01-11u:1647: kim avalambī mama sanānāya vitānādi vitānayati śoka-vaśo' yaṃ lokaḥ ?
GK19gp01-11u:1648: yato mama saṅkalpa-kalpanā-samaye yādṛśāya sarvato vicitrāya putrāya cittaṃ kalpate /
GK19gp01-11u:1649: sa tu parama evāpūrvaḥ katham apūrva-viṣayatāṃ prāpnotu ?
GK19gp01-11u:1650: tata punar anyatra vacana-gocaraṃ racayituṃ saṅkucaty eva ceto-vṛttiḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1651: yato yat khalu mayi dayā-parāyaṇasya śruti-pārāyaṇa-phalasya śrī-nārāyaṇasya rūpaṃ tato' pi madhurataraṃ katarad vā bhavet,
GK19gp01-11u:1653: [51] atha snigdhakaṇṭhaś cintayāmāsa-asya tato' pi madhurataratvaṃ nāyuktam /
GK19gp01-11u:1660: [53] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-atha śrīmatī tat-patnī covāca-kīdṛśaṃ rūpaṃ tad iti kathyatām /
GK19gp01-11u:1664: svapnas tat kim u jāgaraḥ kim athavety etan na niścīyate
GK19gp01-11u:1665: satyaṃ brūhi sadharmiṇi sphurati kiṃ so' yaṃ tavāpy antare //JGc_1,3.21//
GK19gp01-11u:1667: mamāpīyam eva mano-vṛttir mati-vṛttim ativartamānā vartate /
GK19gp01-11u:1668: kevala-vilajjayā taj jātu bhavantaṃ na nivedayāmi /
GK19gp01-11u:1669: tasmād asmād asambhava-manorathān nivṛtti-śāstra-vicāram udyacchantau mana eva saṃyacchevahi /
GK19gp01-11u:1670: [56] sa uvāca-yadyapi mayāpy etad eva madhye madhye sphuṭam adhyavasīyate,
GK19gp01-11u:1671: tathāpy astoko vaśita-viśvodreko mahān sahāyaḥ śrīman-nārāyaṇa-deva eva śaraṇam iti citta-vṛttiḥ parivartate-yo' smākam adṛṣṭāśrutam idaṃ dṛṣṭam iva karoti /
GK19gp01-11u:1672: sa sarvaṃ kṛta-pūrvī tad api kurvīta /
GK19gp01-11u:1674: tasya devasya kām api sevāyogyām evātra yogyām upalabhāmahe /
GK19gp01-11u:1680: tasmād adyārabhya samārabhyatām eṣa vrata iti /
GK19gp01-11u:1681: [61] tad evaṃ sampravadamānayor udbhavan deva-dundubhi-nādaḥ sarvam aticakrām /
GK19gp01-11u:1682: [62] atha tayā vṛtta-sva-citta-vṛtti-prathayā tat-kathayā ślathitavāntaḥ śrī-vraja-dharitrī-kāntaḥ kānta-nijālaṅkāra-vāraṃ sūta-kumārāya vitatāra
GK19gp01-11u:1683: śrīmatī vrajapati-patnī ca mahā-nīlamaṇi-maya-nāyakaṃ hāraṃ vihāpayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:1684: [63] atha sotkaṇṭhaṃ snigdhakaṇṭha uvāca-tarhi kiṃ jātam ?
GK19gp01-11u:1685: [64] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-tena vratena pūrṇe varṣe bṛṃhite ca tarṣe yugapad eva deva-devaḥ svapne tayor āvirbabhūva,
GK19gp01-11u:1687: mayy atisaktau bhaktau kathaṃ nirvidya khidyāthe ?
GK19gp01-11u:1688: yo' sāv atasī-kusuma-suṣamaḥ sukumāraḥ kumāraḥ śaśvad evānubhavator bhavatoḥ kumāratayā sphurati /
GK19gp01-11u:1689: sa tu sadā bhavator evānugataḥ pratikalpaṃ svabhakti-pravartanāya divi mat-pravartita-droṇa-dharā-rūpa-kalāṃśa-kalāvatoḥ
GK19gp01-11u:1690: tad bhūri bhāgyaṃ ity ādi-rītyā brahmādy-alabhya-sākṣāt-tat-phala-sākṣātkārāya svayam
GK19gp01-11u:1691: eva pṛthivyāṃ bhavator bhavator eva bhavaṃ labhata eva æ acirād eva ca rucirā rucireṣā
GK19gp01-11u:1693: [65] tad evaṃ śrāvitābhihite tirohite ca paramahite bhagavati labdha-jāgarāv upalabdhāmṛta-sāgarāv
GK19gp01-11u:1694: iva ca mithas tad eva saṅkathayantau prathayantau ca parama-camatkāra-nivahaṃ vahataḥ sma /
GK19gp01-11u:1695: [66] atha snigdhakaṇṭhaḥ svagataṃ cintayāmāsa-tad evaṃ jātāny eva mama praśnānām uttārāṇi /
GK19gp01-11u:1696: tatra ca bhavator eveti yuktam evoktaṃ śrī-bhagavatā--prāg ayaṃ vasudevasya kvacij
GK19gp01-11u:1697: jātas tavātmajaḥ [10.8.14] iti vadato' py avyabhicāra-vacaḥ-pracāra-sargasya muneḥ
GK19gp01-11u:1699: [67] śrī-bhagavatā saha sambandhaḥ kila kevala-prema-nibandhanaḥ-bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ [BhP 11.14.11] ity ādeḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1700: atas tad-viśeṣasya tad-viśeṣa eva hetuḥ-ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham [Gītā 4.11] ity ādeḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1701: tatas tasmin vatsatāṃ satāṃ vātsalyābhidha eva premā pramāpayati /
GK19gp01-11u:1702: [68] tatra śrī-vasudevasya tad-aiśvaryālocanena vātsalyasya tāralyaṃ sāralyaṃ cāsāditam /
GK19gp01-11u:1703: śrī-vrajarājasya punas tad-vātsalyaṃ śaśvad udbuddhaṃ śuddham eva ca prasiddham /
GK19gp01-11u:1704: pitṛbhyāṃ putratayā tad-dhāraṇe kāraṇaṃ ca munibhir mana eva manyate /
GK19gp01-11u:1706: dadhāra sarvātmakam ātma-bhūtaṃ kāṣṭhā yathānanda-karaṃ manastaḥ [BhP 10.2.18] ity ādeś ca /
GK19gp01-11u:1707: śrī-vraja-rājābhyām api manasā dhāraṇaṃ tasya kāryānyathānupapatti-siddhena bhakti-svābhāvyenaiva sambhāvyate /
GK19gp01-11u:1708: tatra ca sati sāmprataṃ tu viśeṣata eva sāmprataṃ parāvasthām anu kṛtāsaktau hi bhaktau tad-udayaḥ syāt /
GK19gp01-11u:1709: tasmāt tavaivātmajas tasya vasudevasya tu kvacit kārye nimitte jātaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ iti /
GK19gp01-11u:1711: [70] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-tad evaṃ paramārter upakaṇṭhatāṃ prāptāyām utkaṇṭhāyām ekadā sarve' narvācīnā vraja-vāsinaḥ sabhāvāḥ sabhāyāṃ militāḥ
GK19gp01-11u:1712: militvā ca tad eva sotkaṇṭhaṃ suṣṭhu pratuṣṭuvuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1713: [71] tadā ca tatraikā tāpasī kenacana snātakena samam āyātā /
GK19gp01-11u:1714: tāṃ ca mahā-prabhāva-lakṣaṇāṃ lakṣayitvā sarve samutthāyātithyam āvitathyena vidhāya vijñāpayāmāsuḥ-sākṣād bhagavato yogamāyeva kā tvam asi
GK19gp01-11u:1716: [72] sā ca sahāsam āha sma-paurṇamāsī-nāmnī kātyāyanī ca kumāra-śramaṇā ca pārikāṅkṣiṇī cekṣaṇikā cāsmi /
GK19gp01-11u:1718: āvāṃ ca vidyā-viśeṣeṇaitad-vayaskāv eva sadā vidyāvahe /
GK19gp01-11u:1719: [73] te ūcuḥ-etāvatī kṛpā kṛpaṇeṣu katham asmāsu kṛtā ?
GK19gp01-11u:1722: [76] sovāca-bhavatāṃ prāṇa-kandasya śrīman-nandasya jagadānandaḥ sa khalu nandanaḥ sambhaviteti /
GK19gp01-11u:1723: [77] sarve sa-bāṣpa-pulaka-kulam ūcuḥ-bṛhad-vanam asmākam ida bṛhat-tīrthaṃ bhavati /
GK19gp01-11u:1724: tasmād asmabhyaṃ datta-viśrāntike kṛṣṇāntike sphuṭam uṭajaṃ tava ghaṭayāmaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1725: [78] sovāca-upaśrutir eṣā śruti-veṣā navyāpi na vyabhicaritā /
GK19gp01-11u:1726: yataḥ kṛṣṇāyā iti vivakṣitam api kṛṣṇasyeti lakṣitaṃ karoti /
GK19gp01-11u:1728: mahā-prabhāvavati yasmin jātavati nirdānavatā pṛthivyāṃ bhaviṣyati /
GK19gp01-11u:1731: sakiñcanatā viṣaya-sampattau tad-bhaktau tu niṣkiñcanatā ity ādikaṃ viruddhāyamānam api sarvair anuruddhaṃ kariṣyati /
GK19gp01-11u:1732: tasmād asmākam atra sthātum āgraha eva bhavatām anugrahāya sampannaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1733: [79] atha tāṃ sarve sānandaṃ vandamānās tayā samam indīvara-ruci-nindīhita-kālindīṃ vindamānāḥ parṇa-mandiraṃ pūrṇayantas tatra vāsayāmāsuḥ
GK19gp01-11u:1734: [80] tasminn eva divase' pagata-doṣe pradoṣe samudbhaṭa-kaṃsa-roṣeṇa jāta-citta-śoṣeṇa kṛta-paridevena vasudevena prahitā vraja-hitā baḍavārohiṇī rohiṇī guptam ājagāma /
GK19gp01-11u:1735: yasyām āgatāyāṃ parama-pativratāyāṃ sarva eva vraja-rāja-rāja-samājaḥ śubha-śakuna-saṅkula-śakunādi-samajena samam ullalāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:1736: tatra cānanda-mohinyau śrī-yaśodā-rohiṇyau yamunā-gaṅge iva saṅgata-saṅge parasparaṃ parebhyaś ca sukha-samūham ūhatuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1737: [81] vraja-rāja-patnī ca tasyā jyaiṣṭham avaṣṭabhya māsa-traya-jātam antarvatnītvaṃ paryālocya svābheda-vedanenaiva śāta-jātaṃ prāpa /
GK19gp01-11u:1738: [82] atha māgha-māsi cāsita-pratipadi kṛta-sarva-sukha-prasara-janyāṃ rajanyāṃ sā vraja-rājaṃ sevyamānā tandrāparatantrāyamāṇā svapna-tulyatā-saṃcitaṃ kiñcid añcitaṃ dadarśa /
GK19gp01-11u:1739: [83] yathā sa eva bālaḥ sarvatas tad-āvaraṇa-kārikayā kayācic divya-kumārikayātmānaṃ pidhāya vraja-rāja-hṛdayān nija-hṛdayaṃ praviśya dṛśyavad eva sthita iti /
GK19gp01-11u:1740: tataś ca so' yaṃ hṛdaya-kamala-madhym adhyāsāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:1742: vrajarājaś ca nirantara-svāntara-tat-praveśāveśaṃ durnideśaṃ ciram anubhūya dūyamānatāṃ vidhūya tathaivānubhūtavān /
GK19gp01-11u:1743: [84] atha snigdhakaṇṭhaḥ svānte cintayati sma-satyam etad ata eva sad-vāṇī-guṇibhir muhur anayor ātmaja iti matam /
GK19gp01-11u:1744: mayā ca suvicāratas tad eva pūrvaṃ niścitam ācaritam iti /
GK19gp01-11u:1746: [85] madhukaṇṭha uvāca - atha tad ārabhya garbha-lakṣaṇam upalabhya sambhūta-bhavyānāṃ sabhyāṅganā-gaṇānāṃ gokula-kula-pātrī sukha-dātrī babhūva / yathā -
GK19gp01-11u:1747: mukham āpāṇḍu kucāgraṃ sphītaṃ jaṭharaṃ darottuṅgam /
GK19gp01-11u:1750: vraja-rājñyāṃ sphuritātmā kṛṣṇaḥ sphurati sma loke' pi /
GK19gp01-11u:1751: dīpaḥ sphaṭika-ghaṭī-bhāg antar bahir api vibhāti tat-tulyaḥ //JGc_1,3.23//
GK19gp01-11u:1754: spṛhitaṃ kiñcit kiñcid vraja-nṛpa-gṛhiṇī tadā cakre //JGc_1,3.24//
GK19gp01-11u:1758: [86] atha yogamāyā rohiṇyāḥ sāptamāsikaṃ garbhaṃ srastaṃ vidhāya devakyās tad-vidhaṃ taṃ tasyāṃ niyojayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:1759: tataś ca labdha-sarva-samaya-sampad-daśe caturdaśe māsi śrāvaṇataḥ prāk śravaṇa-rkṣe samasta-sukha-rohiṇī rohiṇī guṇa-gaṇanayā suṣamaṃ sita-suṣamaṃ sutaṃ susrāva /
GK19gp01-11u:1768: tat tac ca yuktaṃ sa hi divya-bālakaḥ //JGc_1,3.26//
GK19gp01-11u:1769: [87] sa eṣa ca asita-varṣmā sita-varṣmā sad-anujaḥ sūdita-danujaḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:1772: svayaṃ rāma-nāmā rāma-ramita-dvivida-vidārayitā ca bhavitā iti jyotirvidbhir udbhāvitam /
GK19gp01-11u:1773: [88] asya jātakarmādikaṃ ca marmagair eva śarmāntanāmabhir guptam eva paryāptam akāri ānaka-dundubhi-mantraṇā-paratantratayā /
GK19gp01-11u:1775: [89] yataḥ sa tu janmata evānuja-janma yāvat jaḍa evādṛśyata /
GK19gp01-11u:1776: tatra pratīkāraś caika evāsīt yathāntardhṛta-nijāvarajaṃ vrajeśvary-aṅkam eva kevalaṃ valamānaḥ samullasitaval lakṣyate /
GK19gp01-11u:1777: [90] tad evaṃ dina-katipaye labdha-vyatyaye garbha-sandarbhāt spaṣṭam aṣṭa-māsi tad-avarajanma-janmanaḥ samārambhaḥ sambhavati sma /
GK19gp01-11u:1780: bhādrāntar-bahulāṣṭamīm anu vidhoḥ putre vidhor udgame /
GK19gp01-11u:1781: yoge harṣaṇa-nāmni śuddha-vidhibhe purṇaḥ paraḥ śrī-vidhur
GK19gp01-11u:1782: nandan nanda-vadhū-mude svayam udaid ahnāya dhunvaṃs tamaḥ //JGc_1,3.27//
GK19gp01-11u:1787: vibabhūva vinā satyaṃ dhyānaṃ tretāṃ vinā makhaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1788: vinā dvāparam abhyarcā harer nāma kaliṃ vinā //
GK19gp01-11u:1790: vinā śarad-ambu-śrīḥ śālis tasyāḥ paraṃ vinā //
GK19gp01-11u:1794: vinā sūti-pratītyā ca prasūto' sau yaśodayā //JGc_1,3.29//
GK19gp01-11u:1795: [91] tad idam agre vyaktīkariṣyate / kiṃ ca -
GK19gp01-11u:1801: jātibhiḥ saha mādhavyaḥ ketakyaḥ ketakaiḥ samam /
GK19gp01-11u:1802: kumūdyāny ambujaiḥ sārdhaṃ sphuṭanti smeti dig yadā //
GK19gp01-11u:1803: tadā tad api nāścaryam ācāryaiḥ paricīyate /
GK19gp01-11u:1804: sarvāścarya-nidhiḥ so' pi janma-caryāṃ yato gataḥ //JGc_1,3.32//
GK19gp01-11u:1805: [92] tathā hi etad-uttaraṃ bhāvi-tad-vilokānāṃ lokānāṃ bhāvitānam -
GK19gp01-11u:1806: [93] mukham asya lasita-smitāsita-kamalānām adhipam iva vilokyate,
GK19gp01-11u:1821: kiṃ bahunā, svena mukundam apīti yugapad atra tat-tad-avasara-prasavādīnāṃ tathā durlabha-sannidhīnāṃ nidhīnām api sannipatanaṃ nāsambhāvyam
GK19gp01-11u:1822: [95] atha tasya janmani ko' pi viśeṣaḥ, yathā -
GK19gp01-11u:1827: [96] atha snigdhakaṇṭhena bhāvitaṃ sa-pramāṇaḥ khalv idam - adṛśyatānujā viṣṇoḥ sāyudhāṣṭa-mahābhujā [BhP 10.4.9] iti śrī-bhāgavatād,
GK19gp01-11u:1828: tac ca nandas tv ātmaja utpanne jātāhlādo mahā-manāḥ [BhP 10.5.1] ity ādiṣv ātmaja-padaiḥ sthāpanā-vyapadeśataḥ sadeśa-rūpam eva nirūpyate /
GK19gp01-11u:1829: kintu tad idam apracchannaṃ vivicya pṛcchāmaḥ yatheha sandehaḥ sarveṣāṃ śāmyati /
GK19gp01-11u:1830: [97] spaṣṭam apy ācaṣṭa - aho ārya tarhi kathaṃ vasudeva-devakī-putratayā so' yam avadhāryate ?
GK19gp01-11u:1831: [98] tad īdṛg-vacasi sati snigdhakaṇṭhe vacasi kiñcit-kuṇṭhena madhukaṇṭhena manasi
GK19gp01-11u:1832: bhāvitam - śrīmatā devarṣiṇedam āvāṃ praty atiharṣeṇādiṣṭaṃ - yadi kadācic chrīmati
GK19gp01-11u:1833: mahā-premavati vraje kṛta-vrajanayoḥ kathā-yogo bhavatoḥ sambhāvyate,
GK19gp01-11u:1834: tadā śrī-kṛṣṇa-devasya sarvato varṣyam aiśvaryaṃ gopanīyam ity ato munivarga-prasiddha-garga-siddhāntam evālambya saṃvadiṣyāvahe /
GK19gp01-11u:1835: sa cāmībhiḥ śruta eveti nāścaryāya paryavasiṣyatīti /
GK19gp01-11u:1836: [99] prakaṭaṃ covāca - atra khalv idam asya śrī-vraja-rāja-tanūjasya rahasyam udbhāvayato mama samatikramaḥ svayam amunaiva bāḍhaṃ soḍhavyaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:1837: tathā hi asmin sarvato labdhātirekakā saṃsiddhiḥ khalv ekā vartate /
GK19gp01-11u:1838: yad atikrānta-sarveha-sneha-maya-hṛdaya eva sadā vartamānaḥ snighdatā-digdha-janānāṃ bhāva-mudrayā parokṣaṃ kṛtayāpi svahṛdi pratibimbatatayā mudrito bhavati /
GK19gp01-11u:1839: asya svarūpeṇāvirbhāvaś ca sneha-maya-sphūrti-pūrti-vaśībhāvata eva sarvathā,
GK19gp01-11u:1841: putratayāvirbhāve ca bījaṃ pitṛ-bhāva-maya-sneha eva nānyeṣām ivānyat /
GK19gp01-11u:1842: jāte ca kutracit putratayāvirbhāve tat-tat-sambandha-maya-sneha-kṛta-caya-sphūrtir eva tathā tathā bhāvenāvirbhāve nibandhanaṃ bhavati /
GK19gp01-11u:1844: bhṛti-bhuk-paryantānāṃ vraja-janānāṃ yeṣām adhimadhyaṃ prati-dviparārdhaṃ pratikalpam āvirbhavati,
GK19gp01-11u:1845: vṛddhi-jīvikānām iva teṣām eva prema-sañcaya-paryudañcana-prapañcam añcaṃs tad-vṛddher aparicchedyatābuddhyā pratidātum adhyavasāyaṃ muñcan sadā putrāditayā sa eṣa virājate,
GK19gp01-11u:1846: nānye tu tatra kila tilam apy avakāśa-kālaṃ labhante /
GK19gp01-11u:1847: [101] etad evoktaṃ brahmaṇā eṣāṃ ghoṣa-nivāsinām uta bhavān kiṃ deva rāteti naḥ [BhP 10.14.35] ity ādinā /
GK19gp01-11u:1848: etad eva ca śrī-nārāyaṇa-devena samādiṣṭaṃ - yo' sāv atasī-kusuma-suṣamaḥ sukumāraḥ kumāraḥ ity ādinā / tataś ca -
GK19gp01-11u:1852: śrīmad-vraja-mahendreṇa mahīyamānasya yasya mahābhagavato yā yogamāyākhyā durghaṭa-ghañanī
GK19gp01-11u:1854: tena kila dattā sā tvat-putre śrī-kṛṣṇa eva paryavasyati sma /
GK19gp01-11u:1855: sā ceha svajana-sneha-nikṣipta-cittasya yadyapy asya tat-putrasya prāyo' vadhānaṃ na prāpnoti /
GK19gp01-11u:1856: tathāpi tasmād anyasmāc ca parokṣam anukṣaṇam anugatiṃ līlā-sahāyakaṃ ca prapañcati /
GK19gp01-11u:1857: yathā ca yogamāyā tathā tad-anugatā māyādayo' pīti /
GK19gp01-11u:1858: yadyapy evaṃ tathāpi tvat-prabhu-pratta-śaktim enaṃ tvam eva nija-śrī-prabhṛti-śaktibhir gopāyasveti gargo vyañjitavān /
GK19gp01-11u:1859: tad evaṃ sati bahūni santi nāmāni rūpāṇi ca sutasya te [BhP 10.8.15] ity api tad-uktir udriktīsyāt /
GK19gp01-11u:1862: anumodamānasya tad-bhāva-rūpānurūpaṃ rūpaṃ yadṛcchāvaśād ekadhānekadhā ca samīpator'samīpato'
GK19gp01-11u:1864: [102] tataḥ śrī-vasudeva-devakyor antar yac caturbhujam asya rūpaṃ sphurati,
GK19gp01-11u:1865: tad eva hi bahir āvirbhavati sma /
GK19gp01-11u:1867: tenaiva ca nyāyena śrī-vrajeśvaryos tu paraṃ dvibhuja-mūrtitayā sphūrtir āsīt /
GK19gp01-11u:1868: tataḥ prāg ayaṃ vasudevasya kvacij jātas tavātmajaḥ [BhP 10.8.14] iti dhṛta-tapo-vargasya gargasya vacanam anusṛtya parāmṛśyate /
GK19gp01-11u:1870: tadā tasya yad apūrvaṃ dvibhuja-rūpaṃ pūrvaṃ māyayā saha śrī-yaśodāyāḥ svāntaram āyātaṃ,
GK19gp01-11u:1871: tad eva tatra sannidhānam avāpya caturbhujaṃ rūpam antarbhāvya svayam āvirbabhūva /
GK19gp01-11u:1872: yatra sākāratayā mātṛ-garbha-sthitāpi māyā nirākāratayā tūrdhva-gatyā tanvā tad-vāhanatām āgatā /
GK19gp01-11u:1873: gandavāha-śreṇī nīla-kamala-dalam iva tatra sarvālakṣitatayā tat prāpitavatī /
GK19gp01-11u:1874: yā khalu pūrvaṃ tad-ākarṣeṇa dharṣeṇa paraṃ mātaram api mohena mlāpitavatī /
GK19gp01-11u:1875: [103] atha punas tena garbhasthenākāreṇa mātuḥ prasūti-bhramaṃ ca samprathayya bahir ātmanaṃ saṃvalayya prasūti-śayyām evādhiśayya sthitavatī
GK19gp01-11u:1876: yā khalu śrī-devakītaḥ śrī-rohiṇyāṃ saṅkarṣaṇa-saṅkramaṇe' pi tathā prakramate sma iti /
GK19gp01-11u:1877: [104] atra ca snigdhakaṇṭhenāntaś cintitam - satyam evāha sma nūnaṃ athāham aṃśabhāgena
GK19gp01-11u:1878: [BhP 10.29] iti hi māyāṃ prati śrī-bhagavad-vākyam ādiṣṭā prabhuṇāṃśena kāryārthe
GK19gp01-11u:1879: sambhaviṣyati [BhP 10.1.25] iti ca devān prati brahma-vacanam /
GK19gp01-11u:1881: kāryārthe tat-tan-mohanāya aṃśena sambhaviṣyati śrī-kṛṣṇasya dvibhuja-rūpeṇākāra-bhedena saha miliṣyati seti brahmaṇo' bhiprāyaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:1882: tad evam eva hi vyākhyātam anyatra śrī-bhāgavata-tattvavidbhiḥ avatīrṇau jagaty-arthe svāṃśena bala-keśavau [BhP 10.38.32] ity atra svāṃśena mūrti-bhedeneti /
GK19gp01-11u:1883: [105] api ca śrī-vrajeśvara-sambandha-nibandhanā yā kṛṣṇe yogamāyābhivyaktir uktā sā siddhāntato' pi siddhatām āsīdati /
GK19gp01-11u:1884: bhagavataḥ khalu priyajanecchām evānugacchati sarva-śakti-vyaktir na tu yadṛcchām iti /

GK19gp01-11u:2185: [24] atha tās tad avadhāya tad eva gāyanti sma, yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:2195: ajani vidhur bata yad itaḥ pūrvam //JGc_1,4.30// iti /
GK19gp01-11u:2198: neyaṃ syān navanīta-piṇḍa-visṛtir muktās tu muktāmbudāḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:2200: parvaivedam atīva harṣa-mahasā varṣā-vapur nirmame //JGc_1,4.31// iti /
GK19gp01-11u:2212: śrīman-nandena dāne tu tatra jāto viparyayaḥ //JGc_1,4.34//
GK19gp01-11u:2214: vinā yācñāṃ dadāne tu sarvaṃ vraja-patau tadā /
GK19gp01-11u:2215: kalpadru-cintāmaṇy-ādyās te' py āsan kṛpaṇā iva //JGc_1,4.35//
GK19gp01-11u:2217: anena prīyatāṃ viṣṇus tena stān me sute śivam /
GK19gp01-11u:2218: evaṃ prasabham udbhūtā dāne nandasya bhāvanā //JGc_1,4.36//
GK19gp01-11u:2219: [27] atha sarvā janatā janita-snāna-kāmā samam amunā yamunām ayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:2220: [28] tatra cānandena śrī-nandena saha galad-vrīḍāṃ jala-krīḍāṃ santatya nirmala-parimala-parimilana-pūrvakaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:2221: snānam ātatya divya-vastra-saṃvastraṇaṃ vitatya candra-candana-samālambhaṃ pratatya
GK19gp01-11u:2223: anu namanam avatatya vandi-jana-janita-viśrāva-pūrita-śravasā śravasā valitā sā punas
GK19gp01-11u:2225: [29] tataḥ śrīmān vrajasya rājā ruci-dānāni racayan bandhu-vṛnda-sindhuṃ pūrayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:2226: [30] atha tasminn ānanda-pīvni pratidīvni śrī-rāma-jananyā śraddhā-yantritatayā nimantritāḥ
GK19gp01-11u:2227: kṛta-ghṛta-pakva-jemanāḥ sarva eva parva-lakṣmyā pūritāś candrā iva sva-sva-mandiram avindananta /
GK19gp01-11u:2228: viditvā ca tad-ānandaṃ prati kṛta-pratijāgarāṃ jāgarām eva nṛtya-gītādi-dhanyāyāṃ rajanyām abhajanta /
GK19gp01-11u:2230: yasmād veṣaṃ vividham adadhād bhartṛtaḥ proṣitāpi /
GK19gp01-11u:2232: śrīman-nando' py amanuta nijaṃ bhāgyam āyātim asyāḥ //JGc_1,4.37//
GK19gp01-11u:2233: [31] atha so' yaṃ ratnākaro' pi vrajas taṃ harer āvirbhāvam ārabhyāharahar viraha-rahita-tad-viharaṇād vardhiṣṇu-samṛddhiḥ kām api camatkāritāṃ vitene /
GK19gp01-11u:2234: gopa-samavāyāt kramād āvirbhūtānāṃ prabhūtānāṃ paramāṇāṃ ramāṇāṃ ramaṇa-dhāmatayā tu kim uta ?
GK19gp01-11u:2235: [32] atha madhukaṇṭhena cintanyāñcakre-āṃ śrīmad-bhāgavata-saṃvādaś cātra sambhavati-
GK19gp01-11u:2237: harer nivāsātma-guṇai ramā-krīḍam abhūn nṛpa //[BhP 10.5.18] iti /
GK19gp01-11u:2238: [33] snigdhakaṇṭhas tu vibhāvya punar āha sma-aho mahotsāha-svabhāvatādibhir virājamānatā śrīmad-vrajarājasya / yataḥ-
GK19gp01-11u:2239: tāvan mānaṃ vitaraṇam aho sampadas tāḥ kiyatyas
GK19gp01-11u:2240: tāvat saṅkhyaṃ mahasi racanaṃ bhṛtya-vargāḥ kiyantaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:2242: evaṃ sarvaṃ vraja-narapateḥ ko nu śakto vivektum //JGc_1,4.38// iti /
GK19gp01-11u:2244: īdṛśas tanayo jātas tava goṣṭha-kṣitīśa yaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:2246: [35] tad etad vṛtte ca vṛtte pūrva-dinavad akhilā eva nija-nijālayam āsāditavantaḥ śrī-gokula-yuvarājaś ca gavāṃ kulam iti /
GK19gp01-11u:2252: [1] athottaredyus tathā dyotamānāyāṃ sabhāyāṃ kaṇṭha-dhvani-kṛta-sarvotkaṇṭhaḥ śubhaṃyur madhukaṇṭhaḥ samācaṣṭa,
GK19gp01-11u:2254: [2] atha tasminn evāpadoṣe pradoṣe samasta-deva-rūpa-śrī-vasudeva-sadeśataḥ sandeśa-haraḥ ko' pi gopitātmā śrī-vrajarāja-caraṇa-rājīva-pīṭha-paryanta-dhāma samājagāma /
GK19gp01-11u:2255: sa ca śrīmatā tena tadīya-pratna-sevaka-ratnatayā pariciti-yuktaḥ paryanuyukta-kuśala-tatir
GK19gp01-11u:2256: namaḥ samācarann uvāca-“rakṣāṃsi sarvaṃ bhakṣayituṃ jīvati bhṛśaṃ nṛśaṃse kaṃse kim
GK19gp01-11u:2260: taraṇau ca sati kutrāpi prasthānaṃ na sambhavatīti bāhubhyām eva santaraṇāt tīrṇa-taraṇijaḥ sārdra-vastraḥ pradoṣe samāgato' smi /“
GK19gp01-11u:2263: [4] dūta uvāca-“kim adhikayā vaivadhikatayā sāmpratam asmākam ajīvanir eva jīvātu-vallī,
GK19gp01-11u:2265: [5] vrajarāja uvāca-“samprati taṃ prati kim api viśeṣa-vṛttaṃ vṛttam asti?“
GK19gp01-11u:2267: yata eva tadīya-caraṇa-hitaḥ prahitas tenāham ayam asmi /“
GK19gp01-11u:2269: [8] dūta uvāca-“ānantaryeṇa paryavasitāyā niśāyā niśīthe śrīmad-īśasya tasmin kārāgāra eva śrī-devakī-devītaḥ kācit kanyā jātā /“
GK19gp01-11u:2271: [10] dūta uvāca-“tataḥ sā nava-sutā sutarāṃ guptāpi rudatī rakṣibhir akṣibhir alakṣitāpi viditā,
GK19gp01-11u:2273: sa ca śrī-devakī-devī-vivāha-gatāham ārabhya nabhaḥ-sabhya-jana-vāṇītaḥ suṣṭhu bhītaḥ satataṃ vyagratayā jāgrad eva tiṣṭhati /
GK19gp01-11u:2274: tatas tad-vacana-varṇākarṇana-mātreṇa samagra-vyagra-manāḥ vikṣipta-keśaḥ sa bhojeśaḥ sa-karavālaḥ karālaḥ skhalad-gatiḥ kumatiḥ sūtikāgāram āsasāra /“
GK19gp01-11u:2276: [12] dūta uvāca-“tataś ca niravagraha-graha-van niranugrahaḥ sahasā raṃhasā sūtikā-śayyām eva sajjan sa nirlajjaḥ prajātāyā jāta-parivedanāyā devyāḥ kroḍataḥ samācchidya,
GK19gp01-11u:2277: tad vidyamānam eva vikṣiptatām eva vikṣipta-cittaḥ kṣipram eva tāṃ prastarāya prakṣiptavān,
GK19gp01-11u:2278: yataḥ sarvataḥ sa eva pratikṣiptatām āpa /“
GK19gp01-11u:2279: [13] atha vrajarāja sāsram uvāca-“āḥ katham etad durakṣara-mrakṣitam anakṣaram asmāsu śrāvitam?
GK19gp01-11u:2280: bhavatv, adyāpy avadyam idaṃ madīya-saṃstyāye na prastāvyam /
GK19gp01-11u:2281: sā tu tad-duḥkha-duḥkhitā śrī-devakī-sakhī tathā tad-virahiṇī śrī-rohinī ca moham āpsyati /“
GK19gp01-11u:2287: [16] dūta uvāca-“sā tu kanyā tasyānyāya-bhājo bhojeśasya hastād astāpi prastaram aprāptā,
GK19gp01-11u:2288: pratyuta tan-mastaka-nyasta-caraṇam ūrdhva-gatyā samutpatyāśu divy anyad eva divyaṃ rūpaṃ smitavatī prakāśitavatī /“
GK19gp01-11u:2298: nātrānyathā kim apy anyad api kalyam ākalyatām /
GK19gp01-11u:2299: sā khalv idaṃ sācchūritam accham uvāca,
GK19gp01-11u:2300: ære pāpa kaṃsa kim iti tvam ahan mudhā māṃ
GK19gp01-11u:2302: yasmād upetya nidhanaṃ tava jātu kartā
GK19gp01-11u:2303: tan nānyam apy atiśiśuṃ kvacid iccha hastam //
GK19gp01-11u:2306: sā bhadram idaṃ vadati sma yad adyāvadhi nādhīram avadhīritaḥ so' yaṃ vacasāpi kenacanāpi” iti /
GK19gp01-11u:2309: sa khalu bhrātṛ-vyapadeśa-bhrātṛvyaḥ svasya bhaginy-aṣṭama-garbham aniṣṭatayā niṣṭaṅkitaṃ kurvatīṃ sura-vartma-vāṇīm api devyādiṣṭaḥ sva-dviṣṭa-sura-kptāṃ
GK19gp01-11u:2311: pāda-graha-caryā-paryantāgrahataḥ putra-ṣaṭka-hatyāgas-tyāgaṃ bhūri-visūrita iva vidhitsan nigaḍān mocitavān /“
GK19gp01-11u:2313: [24] dūta uvāca-“tataś ca madīya-śrīmad-īśvarī putra-ghātiny api tasmin sāralya-doṣād eva roṣān nivivṛte /
GK19gp01-11u:2316: samprati tu sarpiḥ-peṣaṃ pinaṣṭi so' yam asmān' iti /
GK19gp01-11u:2317: tad evaṃ tat-kauṭilya-koṭiṃ parikalpyāpi saujaunya-prābalyād iha sāralyam evāvalambitavān /
GK19gp01-11u:2318: tena pitari-śūreṇa durmatinānumataḥ śūra-nandanaḥ saha-dharmiṇyā saha sva-gṛham āgatavāṃś ca,
GK19gp01-11u:2319: na punar viśvāsam āśvāsaṃ ca labdhavān / yataḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:2321: mātaraṃ ca dunoty uccaiḥ śilā-putraḥ śilām iva” //JGc_1,5.3// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:2322: [25] vrajarājaḥ sahāsam uvāca-“tad-anantaraṃ prātar ārabhya sa punar asabhyaḥ kāṃ kārim akārṣīt?“
GK19gp01-11u:2324: tathā hi, prātar asau duṣṭas tv anyad duśceṣṭitam anu ceṣṭitavān /“
GK19gp01-11u:2327: [28] dūta uvāca-“prātaḥ sa tu malinī-kṛta-nija-kulaḥ khalinī-patiḥ svadayitān daiteyān ānayāmāsa niśāmayāmāsa ca niśīthinī-vṛttam /
GK19gp01-11u:2328: te ca bhinna-setavaḥ ketava iva rāhu-nibham etaṃ militā vyaghra-varga-nirghoṣa-prabha-ghargharāyamāṇāṃ goṣṭhīm anuṣṭhitavantaḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:2331: yad viśvadrīcāṃ viṣṇum anucariṣṇūnāṃ deva-devadryag-bhūdeva-gavādīnāṃ pīḍanenaiva tat-pīḍanam īḍitaṃ,
GK19gp01-11u:2332: tathā tat-sadhrīcīna-tayā nirdaśā-nirdaśānāṃ bālānāṃ nirdayatayā nirdalanam iti khalyām eva balyām avalambya tatra sa ca saṃvalate sma /
GK19gp01-11u:2333: tayā ca tadānīṃ bahu samprayacchate sma /“
GK19gp01-11u:2334: [29] vrajarājas tu tad idaṃ ruṣad-vacanam avakalayya saruṣas tataḥ satrāsam uvāca-“tatra śrīmad-bhrātā kim apy akliṣṭaṃ mayy upadiṣṭam asti?“
GK19gp01-11u:2336: yat khalu śīghram evāsmai rāja-vyāja-rākṣasāya saṅgamya balir valayitavyo militavyaś cāham” iti /
GK19gp01-11u:2339: tathā bhavat-putra-nirviśeṣasya tasya bāla-viśeṣasya vṛttir vartayitavyā” iti /
GK19gp01-11u:2340: [31] atha tad etad avakalayya saṃśayya ca taṃ bhojanādinā yojayitvā,
GK19gp01-11u:2341: nijāgrajā-nujān ākārya tad agre punas taṃ tad anu rahasam anuvyāhāritavān /
GK19gp01-11u:2343: sāmprataṃ kareṇaiva kareṇa rāja-viṣa-dharasya tasya mukha-mudraṇam eva sāmpratam /“
GK19gp01-11u:2344: [33] atha vrajeśas taṃ sandeśam urasikṛtya prātaḥ-prāyam adhigamya dūtaṃ nidideśa,
GK19gp01-11u:2347: tad-bālakasya sāṅga-maṅgala-saṅgitāṃ tathā tasya vāñchitam anyam udayan-mudam udantam api sva-mukha-svasti-mukhata eva prathayatu /
GK19gp01-11u:2348: vayaṃ tu bhrātur ājñayā rājñe karam ācitya prābhṛtaṃ ca paritaḥ pracitya dina-pañcakānantaram āgacchanta eva sma /“
GK19gp01-11u:2349: [34] tad evaṃ gate dūte dināntare tu jātaka-mātuḥ snāna-vidhāne kṛta-sandhāne sarva-maṅgala-saṅgatam
GK19gp01-11u:2351: yathā puraḥsaram antaḥ-puram ānāyam ānāyaṃ nava-bālakaṃ gopāla-bhūpālaḥ samālokayāmāsa / tathā hi,
GK19gp01-11u:2353: satraṃ jajñe tathā tac-chravaṇa-parimalād eva śaktā yathā te /
GK19gp01-11u:2355: ūhur bhārāyamāṇāny uta dadhur amitān sveda-romāñca-bāṣpān //
GK19gp01-11u:2357: prāgryā eva nimantritā vraja-janāḥ sarve tu tatrāyayuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:2359: vyāptaḥ syāt kim u tarhi ṣaṭpada-gaṇān ākārayaty ātmanā //JGc_1,5.5// [śārdūla]
GK19gp01-11u:2362: darśaṃ darśam amī na yadyapi gatās tṛptiṃ tathāpy uccakair
GK19gp01-11u:2365: yan mā mādṛśa-dṛṣṭi-sambhrama-vaśād utthāta yūyaṃ muhuḥ /“
GK19gp01-11u:2369: vantas tad-bāla-dṛṣṭyā pramudita-hṛdayair ūcire kaiścid evam /
GK19gp01-11u:2370: “śobhā sā dṛṣṭi-gamyā na tu para-vacana-śreṇi-gamye“ti harṣāt
GK19gp01-11u:2371: kuṇṭhat-kaṇṭhair abhāvi prativacasi parais tat tu nāśrāvi cānyaiḥ //
GK19gp01-11u:2376: prattaṃ pitrā ko' pi koṣo hy anantaḥ //JGc_1,5.9// [śālinī]
GK19gp01-11u:2386: [35] atha mathurā-pathikatāṃ prathayiṣyamāṇaḥ śrī-gokula-kula-rājas tv agrajādīn nija-pratinidhitādi-karmaṇi nirmāya calann antaś cintitavān,
GK19gp01-11u:2388: suhṛdi durhṛdi ca mama mānasaṃ samāna-sambandha-hārda-bandham api prasabhaṃ bhṛśam eva tatra prasajjati nava-jātake,
GK19gp01-11u:2389: yenāsau pībitā jīvitāśāpi na paricchinnatām icchati /
GK19gp01-11u:2392: tasmād vikalatāvikalanāya vilokaṃ vilokam eva taṃ bālakaṃ yadu-nilayaṃ calāni” iti /
GK19gp01-11u:2394: utsaṅge nihitasya tasya tu śiśor vaktraṃ muhur dṛṣṭavān
GK19gp01-11u:2395: nāmodaṃ ciram ādade niṭilakād gaṇḍāv acumbīd bhṛśam /
GK19gp01-11u:2396: āśiśleṣatarāṃ vapur na tu tadā tṛptiṃ vrajeśo yayau
GK19gp01-11u:2397: yāṃ pātheyatayā viveda mathurā-prasthānam āsthāya saḥ //JGc_1,5.12// [śārdūla]
GK19gp01-11u:2398: vatse śyāma pitā tavāyam ayituṃ rājñaḥ puraṃ tvat-kṛtā-
GK19gp01-11u:2399: nujñāṃ prārthayate tato vitaratād” ity eṣa dhātrīritaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:2406: [37] atha mathurām āsādya sadya eva karādhikāriṣu karam upasādya tad-dvārā dūrata eva rājānam anujānantaṃ prasādya śakaṭa-ghaṭāvamocanam evānañca,
GK19gp01-11u:2410: para-dhanāyayā dhanānusandhāna-nirbandha-sandho' pi sa katham asmin nigama-śiṣṭi-saṃsliṣṭe
GK19gp01-11u:2411: vicitreṇa putrekṣaṇena putra-kṣaṇena ca vismāyita-sakale jagad-vitta-vittā-śakale saralāyate sma /
GK19gp01-11u:2412: [39] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-uktam eva purā yat praguṇatayākhilasamañjasayaśasaḥ śrī-vrajeśacandramasaḥ khalv asya guṇena guṇeneva ko vā baddho na bhavet? it /
GK19gp01-11u:2414: [41] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-tato vraja-trātari taṃ bhrātaram anu nirjana-milanāya mantraṃ
GK19gp01-11u:2415: valayati paryakalitāvasaraḥ sa śrī-śūra-tanūja-varaḥ svayaṃ kevala-sevaka-viśeṣa-saṅgitayā saṃvalate sma /
GK19gp01-11u:2416: [42] atha tenāvrajita-sadeśaḥ śrīmān vraja-maheśaḥ sahasā mahasāvṛtatayā sābhyutthānam utthāya nyāya-paramaḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:2417: kṛta-tad-abhigamaḥ svam anujam anuraktaḥ pariṣvaktavān pariṣvaktaś cānena na tu kañcit kaścin natavān,
GK19gp01-11u:2418: jātāv ekasya jyāyastvam anyasya tu jātāv iti /
GK19gp01-11u:2419: na ca kevalam etad eva kāraṇatām avalambate,
GK19gp01-11u:2422: [43] etad eva ca dṛṣṭāntena spaṣṭīkṛtaṃ śrī-bādarāyaṇinā--dehaḥ prāṇam ivāgatam [BhP 10.5.21] iti /
GK19gp01-11u:2423: atra ca deha-sthānīyasya go-sthāna-pater asmad-īśitur evāsaktir atiriktā darśitā /
GK19gp01-11u:2425: dehas tu taṃ vinā na bhavaty eveti /
GK19gp01-11u:2426: sa tu catura-śiromaṇiḥ svayam eva rāgatas tac-chivirāgatas tenātithivad eva pūjitas tad-vyavahāreṇa jitaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:2427: samprati jātayoḥ sva-tanujātayoḥ prasakta-dhīr idam uktavān-
GK19gp01-11u:2431: ca payaḥ-payodhir ivāyaṃ vrajādhīśvaras tu tasya sarva-stutasya vaṃśān kaṃsa-kṛta-dhvaṃsān anuśocan,
GK19gp01-11u:2432: karma-vāda-rocanayā dhairyaṃ saṃvarmayann ātmanaś ca tasya ca śarma sūnṛtāmṛta-bhṛta-santarpaṇaṃ kṛtavān /
GK19gp01-11u:2433: [45] tataḥ śrīmān ānakadundubhis taṃ kṛta-kāryam avadhārya bhāvy utpātaṃ vicārya sva-bhavanam eva gantum anumatavān /
GK19gp01-11u:2434: śrī-vrajarājas tu vastutaś cetasā cetaḥ pracalita eva,
GK19gp01-11u:2435: samprati tu gehaṃ prati deham evehayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:2437: yathā pūrva-devānāṃ pūrva-mantraṇāyām āmantritā rākṣasa-pakṣiṇī nirdaśāna-nirdaśāṃś ca deśa-deśataḥ śāvakān bakān iva śyenī vinighnatī,
GK19gp01-11u:2438: kaṃsasya nighnatī vairocani-kanyā rajanyām asyāṃ vraja-pradeśa-sadeśam ājagāma;
GK19gp01-11u:2444: pratīka-mātra-prāṇi-pratīkā pṛthukān eva ca pṛthukān iva kurvatī vartate /
GK19gp01-11u:2445: [47] atha sā śrī-vraja-kṣitīśa-rakṣita-gīrvāṇa-vāṇa-jña-dhānuṣka-bhiyā duṣkara-svarūpaṃ vihāya hāri-rūpāntaraṃ prātihārikatayā dhṛtavatī,
GK19gp01-11u:2446: yena khalu sampad-adhidevīyam adhibhūmi sampatantī nijāśraya-viśeṣam anvicchantī

GK19gp01-11u:2787: [16] tad anu ca sarva eva śāntatāmāyāntas tad-antaṃ samantataḥ śakaṭa-nikaṭa-saṃvalakān bālakān eva papracchuḥ /

GK19gp01-11u:2793: [17] tataś ca, tad-viḍamba-vādiṣu bālādiṣu hasatsu bībhatsita-bāliśa-bhāṣitāḥ parama-vatsalā vicikitsāṃ na dhitsāṃ cakruḥ /

GK19gp01-11u:2803: yato yogamāyā khalv asya sambhāvita-yogaṃ nirmāpayatīti punar mā prākṣīḥ /

GK19gp01-11u:2807: yatas tadīya-jananyoḥ svayam eva tal-lālanāya lālasā-dhanyayos,
GK19gp01-11u:2808: tatra ca paraspara-tad-āsaktayor nānā-spṛha-gṛha-kārya-paryāpaṇa-vyasanayor yugapat tad-yugalasya pṛthag-avakalanaṃ durbalam iti kevalaṃ sudināgamana-vilambatām avalambe /
GK19gp01-11u:2809: yathā vā bhavatām icchā bhavati” iti śrutvā śrutajñāḥ śrotriyān āśrāvya tadaiva daivānukūlyaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:2810: nibhālya samam udyad-vādya-parīta-gīta-svasti-vācanādi-praśasti-pūrvakaṃ dvayor apūrva-milanam āśu kalayāmāsuḥ /

GK19gp01-11u:3378: sa eva tad aho kathaṃ kim iva hanta kiṃ sidhyati //JGc_1,7.38// [pṛthvī]

GK19gp01-11u:3381: sutaḥ sa eṣa svam idaṃ ca gokulam /
GK19gp01-11u:3384: [50] tad evaṃ sa ca nārāyaṇas tad-bhāva-parāyaṇatāṃ tām anu nitāntāṃ vicārayann ātmanaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:3385: paramābhiruci-paricitāvirbhāve tasminn eva vismiti-nicitaṃ janany-ucita-sneham eva dehayāmāsa,
GK19gp01-11u:3386: yaṃ khalu nemaṃ viriñci [BhP 10.9.20] vakṣyamāṇānusāreṇa samastāni śāstrāṇi sadā praśastatayā gāyanti /
GK19gp01-11u:3388: tad evaṃ sarvānandanaḥ śrīman-nanda-nandanaḥ krīṇīhi bhoḥ phalāni iti [BhP 10.11.10]
GK19gp01-11u:3389: gīti-rīti-rocana-vacanaṃ karṇayor āracayann eva capala-locanaḥ kiñcanāpy ālocayann
GK19gp01-11u:3390: eva ca laghunāpi pāṇi-yugalena laghutayā puraḥ patita-dhānya-puñjataḥ pūrṇam añjalim
GK19gp01-11u:3392: kintu drava-vaśād alpakāñjalitaḥ skhalitam idam iti bhidāṃ na vidāñcakāra,
GK19gp01-11u:3393: kevalam eva kara-yugalaṃ krayya-phala-pūrita-tat-patra-pātropari parivṛttyā ca cālayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3395: vyañjita-spṛhāvalīṃ tad-añjaliṃ phala-valayena bhikṣayantī dūrata eva saṅkalana-mudrām
GK19gp01-11u:3396: api śikṣayantī sakalena tu pūrayituṃ śaśāka /
GK19gp01-11u:3397: [53] nija-bhājanaṃ phala-riktaṃ babhūva vā na vā kim iti tu na viviktuṃ cakāra /
GK19gp01-11u:3398: gṛhābhyantareṇāntarite tu tasmin nijaṃ patrajam amatram ayatnatayā ratna-pūritam
GK19gp01-11u:3399: apy anibhālya bhāram apy asambhālya tan-mādhuryāveśābhiniveśavatī svajanānām api
GK19gp01-11u:3400: śarma-jananāya bahula-phalāvali-bali-samānayanāya ca nija-nilayam eva jagāma /
GK19gp01-11u:3401: kintu gṛhaṃ gatvā jñāta-maṇi-tattvāpy akuṇṭhāsakṛd-utkaṇṭhāvahena tan-mukha-śobhābhara-viraheṇa sā dhanyā hārita-mahā-dhanaṃ-manyā babhūva,
GK19gp01-11u:3402: yata eva sā kṛṣṇa-dṛśvarī viśvam api visasmāra /
GK19gp01-11u:3404: nṛtyann iva mātuḥ samīpam añcan madhura-cañcalehitas tasyā nicolāñcale nirbandhataḥ
GK19gp01-11u:3408: kadācid ācita-phalā dhānyāni mūlyam ādāya dhanyā mayi cānukūlyam ādhāya samarpitavatī /
GK19gp01-11u:3410: gṛhajanavat sarvataḥ pratītiṃ mā kṛthāḥ iti /
GK19gp01-11u:3411: [58] sutas tu kā khalv apratītir iti ca na vidāñcakāra /
GK19gp01-11u:3412: [59] kṣaṇataś ca tāṃ gatāṃ nirīkṣya punar āgataḥ sakṣaṇatayā janāya tat-phala-vibhajanāya jananīṃ niyojayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3413: [60] mātā cāmandenānandena kṛta-spandena kara-dvandvena tāni vibhajantī tadantīkṛtiṃ nāsasāda /
GK19gp01-11u:3415: tad-āsvāda-karāś ca labdha-camatkārā na vismaranti sma /
GK19gp01-11u:3422: [62] tadā caikadā gṛha-vyaya-payaḥ-kṛte samīpakṛte vatsa-sadmani ruddha-dvārān śakṛt-kari-sārān bāla-hariḥ paritaḥ-sthita-bālaka-jālaḥ kalayāmāsa / tatra ca,
GK19gp01-11u:3423: vatsīr matvā tadā dhenūś chāga-tokāni vatsakān /
GK19gp01-11u:3425: vatsīṣu yarhi gavyanto goduhanti sma te' rbhakāḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3426: teṣāṃ prahāsajā bhāsaḥ payasyante sma tās tadā //JGc_1,7.42// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:3431: [63] tac ca tarṇakānugatayā tayoḥ prathamam abhyarṇāgamanam ākarṇya nirvarṇya ca vara-varṇinyaḥ skhalad-varṇaṃ varṇayāmāsuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3449: [64] tad evam aṅganād aṅganād vrajāṅganābhir aham-pūrvikayānugamyamānau,
GK19gp01-11u:3453: tāsu ca kābhiścid amṛtam anṛtaṃ kurvatā praticarvaṇaṃ sarasena rasa-visareṇa bhojyamānau,
GK19gp01-11u:3454: tadvad ekābhir nija-gṛhājīvya-divya-maṇi-hāram upahāram upahāraṃ hāritayopayojyamānau tadvad varṇyamānau,
GK19gp01-11u:3455: tāsu ca kābhir api premānugamya-ramya-vacana-pracaya-racanayā kañcana kālaṃ varivasyamānau,
GK19gp01-11u:3457: tadvad anyatarābhis tan-madhura-cakura-cikura-cañcuratā-pracura-cañcalatāṃ nicāyya cāturyataś caritam idaṃ bhavan-mātṛ-caraṇeṣu gocarayāmaḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:3459: tābhir eva mātara-pitarāv ārabhya gaṇanālabhya-kulāli-gāli-pālim upalabhya kalita-vyalīkam iva sa-kolāhala-praṇaya-kalita-kalitayā tarjyamānau
GK19gp01-11u:3461: [65] atha mātarāv api jātāv amū kutra yātāv iti kātarāyamāṇa-nayane nirjanatā-janita-svairatā-bhāg-ayane
GK19gp01-11u:3462: vraja-nīvṛd-ayane ruṣā ninditābhir upamātṛbhir mudā vanditābhir api tad-abhidhātṛ-yātṛbhiḥ
GK19gp01-11u:3463: samam eva gṛhataḥ kṛta-niryāṇe svayam eva samyag mṛgayamāṇe dara-sarasi-janija-cihna-vigata-nihnava-caraṇa-lakṣaṇa-vilakṣaṇa-vartma-valanena
GK19gp01-11u:3465: tadā ca nijāgamana-varjanīṃ tarjanīm abhicālya pracchannatayā nibhālya tasmād akasmād anayor bāhū jagṛhatuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3466: bālakās tu sarvataḥ sarva eva dudruvuḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:3467: mahilāś ca kāścanānukūlyataḥ kāścana prātikūlyata iva ca tayoś cāpalyaṃ lapantyaḥ samam eva mātṛbhyām abhyāyayuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3468: dhātryas tu bālayor atīva sneha-pātryas tarṇakān ādāya
GK19gp01-11u:3470: [66] atha tad ārabhya vīthīṃ vīthīm upalabhya kutukakarmā balānujanmā saha- sahacaraḥ kolāhalaṃ kalayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3471: tadā ca kadācin nijatanūjalabhyaprāgalbhya-spṛhiṇī vrajeśagṛhiṇī tadānandabṛṃhiṇībhir
GK19gp01-11u:3486: kaḥ kiṃ kurute na yadi nidānam //
GK19gp01-11u:3488: krośaṃ na kim iva kuruṣe bhāmini //
GK19gp01-11u:3519: [69] punaś ca pratītim āsādayantya ivedaṃ vadanti sma,
GK19gp01-11u:3522: tan-madhyād api cittaṃ harato nṛ-harer na hāryaṃ kim? //JGc_1,7.48// [āryā]
GK19gp01-11u:3523: [70] tad evam abhīṣaṅga-bhaṅgībhir vara-varṇinībhir varṇyamānam ākarṇya capala-dṛṣṭi-parāmṛṣṭi-karṇaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:3524: jhaṭiti jāta-vilakṣaṇa-varṇaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇa-mukha-śrī-parṇaṃ nirvarṇya vihasantīṃ tām
GK19gp01-11u:3525: anu vihasantībhis tābhiḥ śapantībhir iva bhaṇitam-yadi ca vayaṃ sādhu-caritācaritārthatāṃ gatās,
GK19gp01-11u:3526: tadā bhavatyā bhavane' pi śīghram etat patiṣyati /
GK19gp01-11u:3530: muhur ayam asmad-ālayaṃ valiṣyate iti vicāryaiva caryeyam amūbhir ācaryate sma /
GK19gp01-11u:3534: [74] tad evaṃ tad-divāvṛtte pūrvavad eva tal-līlā-parvaṇi sākṣād iva vṛtte sarve puraskṛta-vrajeśāḥ sambhṛta-tat-tad-āveśā yathāyatham ātma-pathaṃ pratasthire /
GK19gp01-11u:3540: [1] athetaradyur api prabhāta eva sabhām upaviśya vibhāteṣu vaiśyajāteṣu snigdhakaṇṭha uvāca-kadācid dāmodara-māsi darānvavasāne,
GK19gp01-11u:3541: sāmodā yaśodā prātar bāla-gopālaṃ śayānam unmīlan-nibha-netra-nīla-nalina-yugalaṃ nibhālya śanair eva kara-kiśalayena palyaṅkād upari talpa eva parilālya punar asūṣupat-kalpam /
GK19gp01-11u:3542: tasmād alpam alpaṃ niṣkrāmantī cālindaṃ vindamānā prāhṇetarām ahnāya nijālaya-vyaya-sambandhi dadhi katipayaṃ nicita-nicaya-granthir manthitum ārebhe /
GK19gp01-11u:3543: yasminn ahani saha-nandanāmanda-syandanārohiṇī rohiṇī praṇaya-maya-yantraṇayā nimantraṇayā śrīmad-upananda-mandiraṃ vindamānāsīt /
GK19gp01-11u:3547: [2] tad evaṃ svayam eva sayatnī-bhūya vraja-rāja-patnī dadhi-cayam asakṛd adhimathnatī
GK19gp01-11u:3548: tasya nidrāyā drāghīyastvāya gāyantī tadeka-tānatayā tad-ānanam eva nicāyantī paritas
GK19gp01-11u:3571: māṃ mātaram anu sukham udvitanu pratataṃ satataṃ kṛṣṇa /
GK19gp01-11u:3577: [5] atha labdha-jāgaraḥ sa nityatā-śāli-lālitya-sāgaraḥ sapadi rudann iva samutthitavān,
GK19gp01-11u:3584: tena subhagākhaṇḍalena vighaṭite kṣubdha-daṇḍasya gati-maṇḍale svayaṃ payas-tananayoḥ
GK19gp01-11u:3585: stanayoḥ prasnavaṃ navakaṃ taṃ śāvakaṃ pāyayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3587: tasyāḥ payodhare suṣṭhu kṛṣṇaś cātakatāṃ gataḥ //JGc_1,8.4// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:3588: [7] sā tatra gardhenārdhe tena pīte dhanye stanye netrānantara-gṛhāntara-santāpyamāna-payaḥ-santānānām utsekaṃ prati nirvivekatāṃ pratipadya sadya eva taṃ vihāya yad-drutavatī,
GK19gp01-11u:3589: drava-gamane tasya patana-bhītyā ca na taṃ gṛhītvā gatavatī /
GK19gp01-11u:3591: tāvan-mātrāya tasyāḥ kathaṃ kṣut-kṣāma-gātrād bāla-putrād anyatra yātrā yukti-pātrāyatām?
GK19gp01-11u:3595: puro' vadhīyatāṃ yad vātsalyavilāsa eva khalv ayam asyāḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3598: ye geha-dehādayas taṃ vināstamita-prāyā manyante sma,
GK19gp01-11u:3599: te tu taj-janmārabhya tan-mamatā-maya-mamatā eva tābhyāṃ pitṛbhyām abhyamanyanta /
GK19gp01-11u:3600: yad-dhāmārtha-suhṛt-priyātma-tanaya-prāṇāśayas tvat-kṛte [BhP 10.14.35] iti brahma-vākye vraja-mātrasyāpi tathā śrūyate,
GK19gp01-11u:3602: idaṃ ca mugdhaṃ dugdhaṃ dadhi ca tad-adhika-tat-pradhānatāvadhikam eveti sa-viśeṣatayāvagamyate /
GK19gp01-11u:3603: [12] tad evaṃ sati tasyāḥ seyaṃ bhāvanā- kleśam api viṣahya spṛhyamāṇāṃ nānā-nija-gṛhya-kriyāṃ
GK19gp01-11u:3604: sāmprataṃ na jānāti so' yaṃ bālaka iti dayanīyatayāsmadīyam eva khalv etadīya-kṛtyaṃ kṛtyam iti /
GK19gp01-11u:3605: so' yam evaṃ-vidha-sneha-vividha-vidhis tair eva boddhum adhyavasyate yaiḥ kṛtaṃ tarjana-tāḍanādikam api lālanā-mayatāṃ kalayati,
GK19gp01-11u:3612: [13] tathā hi, tayor mitho hitayor ubhayor api caritam /
GK19gp01-11u:3613: dugdhāya gamana-samaye sā khalu tan-muditatā-nibandhanam idam uditavatī,
GK19gp01-11u:3617: tvadīyaṃ payo vīkṣya yāvad drutam aham āyāmi iti / tataś ca-
GK19gp01-11u:3619: ambā yayau drutam asau tata āyayau ca /
GK19gp01-11u:3623: [14] tad evam api sa tu nijārthite pratyarthite bhṛśam āvijate sma, yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:3634: [16] tad evaṃ kalaśāntarīṇe kālaśeye sarvato rīṇe parvāntaram api jātam, yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:3644: tataḥ kṣaṇād dugdham itaṃ tu mugdhatām
GK19gp01-11u:3646: aprāpya taṃ tasya tu karma tad-vidhaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:3648: [18] tatra prathamaṃ śaṅkā-saṅkasukāyāṃ tasyāṃ yogamāyā-prakāśitākāśa-vāg eva hāsa-prakāśanasya bodhasya kāraṇaṃ jātam / [19] sā yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:3652: kamalam aparam añcan prāpa tasmin madhūni //JGc_1,8.12// [mālinī]
GK19gp01-11u:3658: [20] tad evaṃ śrutvā hasitvā kālaśeya-leśādhyavaseyatānapahnava-caraṇa-cihnam īkṣitvā sādhakatamāntareṇa dvāra-yantraṃ mocayitvā ca sā punar evam ācacāra-
GK19gp01-11u:3672: vīkṣya smitaṃ prāpa tathā ca vismitam //JGc_1,8.16// [upajāti 12]
GK19gp01-11u:3677: [22] sa khalu dṛptaḥ śākhā-mṛgas tu navanītānāṃ tṛptaḥ paṭa-veṣṭita-yaṣṭim etāṃ dṛṣṭvā drutam eva śākhām ārūḍhaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3682: tokaṃ dhartuṃ sā samīpe' pi śīghraṃ
GK19gp01-11u:3683: dhāvantī tat prāpa dhāvan na mātā /
GK19gp01-11u:3686: [23] atha pura-dvāraṃ na mātur gamana-dvāram iti matvā palāyana-grahilas tad-diśam eva jagrāha /
GK19gp01-11u:3687: jananī tu tadānīṃ tatrājanatāṃ jānatī tam evānuyātavatī / tataś ca,
GK19gp01-11u:3709: rahasā saha sā rājñī sahasā sahasātanot //JGc_1,8.24// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:3712: ity ādy acakalan mātā śiśunā gavya-coriṇā //JGc_1,8.25// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:3725: dambhaś ca mucyatām iti mātrā pṛṣṭaḥ sṛṣṭa-rodana-netraḥ putra uvāca-
GK19gp01-11u:3729: kīśo' yam īśa-nirdiṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ sadma muṣṭaye /
GK19gp01-11u:3732: tathāpi tvām ātta-yaṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭvā dudrava coravat /
GK19gp01-11u:3733: tvaṃ punar māṃ vṛthā bhītam api dudrotha nirdayam //JGc_1,8.30// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:3734: [26] atha sānutāpam iva mātā prāha-re vāco-yuktimattama corottama/
GK19gp01-11u:3735: tvaṃ narottama-jāto' pi vānara-priyo vānara-prakṛtir evāsi /
GK19gp01-11u:3736: [27] sutas tu sa-bhayaṃ sabhaya-pradānam apy uvāca-tato vanam eva praviśya sthāsyāmi /
GK19gp01-11u:3741: yad ekayā mayālaya-bālayor avadhānaṃ durdhānaṃ bhavitā /
GK19gp01-11u:3745: baddhvā bhavantam aham āśu calāmi gehaṃ,
GK19gp01-11u:3746: śaktir yadi prathayatāṃ kuru cauryam anyat //
GK19gp01-11u:3748: [30] bandhodyame ruṣitatā-ruṣitaḥ putraḥ phut-kurvann iva sāsram uccair uvāca-amba,
GK19gp01-11u:3753: [31] tad etad dūragatayā tayā nāvadhāryate sma,
GK19gp01-11u:3754: kintu parāḥ pāramparyeṇāvadhārya kṛtopālambha-caryāḥ kāścin nikaṭa-nikāyyā nāryaḥ parivārya militāḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3755: sva-vācam iha smārayitum aikāgārikaḥ so' yaṃ bhavad-agāre' pi kāṃ kārim akārṣīt iti sūcayantya iva saha jahasuś ca /
GK19gp01-11u:3756: [32] tatas tad anavadadhatī kuntala-santāna-bandhād vighaṭitāṃ paṭṭa-ḍorīm ekām upasādya,
GK19gp01-11u:3757: sadyaḥ sadma-dvārāntar upasadyamānam udūkhalam anu vatsa-gala-bandhavad alagnam evāvalagne sa-nirbandhaṃ bandhum udyatavatī,
GK19gp01-11u:3760: [33] tataś ca tasyā dhammillād udvāsyānyasyā vinyastatve' pi tad-avasthatāyāṃ dṛśyamānāyāṃ
GK19gp01-11u:3761: sāścaryam iva nāry-arpitair manthana-netrair bahubhir api pāraṃ na vavrāja vrajeśvarī / tataś ca-
GK19gp01-11u:3763: dṛśyante sma vaṭās tatra vidūrādrau ghanā iva //JGc_1,8.32// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:3767: sa eṣa samunnatayā mohanatayā kaphallakam api vellayan loptra-mātra-sukalatānandī parāskandī sandīpyate iti /
GK19gp01-11u:3769: kintu bhavatīnām eva kāpīyam avadyāvidyā yad antar asya pakṣa-pātinyaḥ samīkṣyadhve,
GK19gp01-11u:3776: tarhi garga-vacana-vargavat sakṛt kāpi bhāgavatī śaktir evāmum avaruṇaddhi,
GK19gp01-11u:3778: [38] atheyam asyāścaryasya paryantaṃ paryālocituṃ tābhir eva gṛhād anyāny api manthana-dāmāni muhur muhur ānāyya sanirbandhaṃ bandham ādadhaty api gaty-antaraṃ na prāpa / tataś ca-
GK19gp01-11u:3784: [39] tato yāvad eva yādava-deva-kulajasya tasya haṭhavattāyāṃ prayatnādhīr āsīt,
GK19gp01-11u:3786: mātṛ-vaikalyena kalyamāna-manastve tu prathama-ḍorikā-dvaya-mātra-sambaddha-gātratayā baddha eva so' yam abudhyata /
GK19gp01-11u:3787: anyāni tu sarvāṇi dāmāni tasminn urvaritāny evādṛśyanta /
GK19gp01-11u:3790: api bhrama evāyam iti pratyayaḥ pratyaham āsādyata /
GK19gp01-11u:3791: [41] atha labdha-sandhaṃ taṃ bandhaṃ dīrghatamayānyayā rajjvābadhya ca tayā tad-udūkhala-madhyaṃ babandha /
GK19gp01-11u:3792: [42] baddhvā ca mātā śikṣāṃ ghaṭayantī nija-kaṭhinatām eva tasmin haṭhini prakaṭayantī tābhir vihasantībhiḥ saha sa-narma-geha-karmaṇe gacchantī,
GK19gp01-11u:3794: [43] tataś ca gatāsu tāsu kṣaṇaṃ kṛta-rodana-vinodaḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:3795: paścād bahala-khalaṃ praty udūkhala-nodanāya labdha-modaḥ sa tu baddha eva kevala-bāla-valitatayā
GK19gp01-11u:3796: prabalita-cāpala-śraddhas taiḥ saha prahasan khelann ulūkhalam etaṃ laghu laghu cālayām āsa,
GK19gp01-11u:3797: hārayāmāsa ca tair evolbaṇa-hāsatayā śulva-hāriṇīnāṃ labdha-śūnya-sādharmya-harmya-śreṇyā hāri-śikyita-nava-nava-nītādikam āhārayāmāsa ca /
GK19gp01-11u:3798: kintu, tat-karṣaṇa-maya-harṣa-prada-līlayā na ca kareṇa na cāpareṇa tad-uddāna-mocana-rocanatām avāpa /
GK19gp01-11u:3799: [44] tatra tu pura-dvāra-purastād-varti vātāvarta-vartita-nartanam iva yamalam arjuna-dvayam asya netra-vartmani vartate sma /
GK19gp01-11u:3800: krameṇa cāsau tayor antara eva vikramate sma iti /
GK19gp01-11u:3801: [45] etāvan mukta-kaṇṭham uṭṭaṅkayan snigdhakaṇṭhas tad-bhañjane kāraṇaṃ harer aiśvarya-pracāraṇam
GK19gp01-11u:3802: iti tat pratārayan kāraṇāntaram eva vyājahāra- [46] tataḥ sphuṭaṃ jhaṭiti parataḥ
GK19gp01-11u:3804: tad-adhvanas tu saṅkṣiptatayādhaḥ-kṣiptatayā tad udūkhalaṃ pratitaṣṭambhe /
GK19gp01-11u:3805: [47] atha sphuṭam asau vaṭītroṭanecchayā tat kṛṣṭavān /
GK19gp01-11u:3818: [49] atha tayor atyūrjitena visphūrjitena muhūrtārdham ārtatayā goṣṭhādhiṣṭhānā mūrcchām ṛcchantaḥ sthitāḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:3820: sā tu tal-līlā-mādhurī-dhurīṇatayā citrākṛtir iva mitrāvalī na vitrāsam āsasāda /
GK19gp01-11u:3821: [50] dūrād api tad-ūrjitaṃ visphūrjitaṃ sambhrama-kāry avadhārya tu vraja-pati-mukhās tarkita-mukhās tad evābhipratasthire /
GK19gp01-11u:3823: vinā vātaṃ vinā varṣaṃ vidyut-prapatanaṃ vinā /
GK19gp01-11u:3824: vinā hasti-kṛtaṃ doṣaṃ kenemau pātitau drumau? //JGc_1,8.37// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:3826: tasmāt tasmān mahā-garjān mūrcchām ārcchan vraje janāḥ //JGc_1,8.38// iti /
GK19gp01-11u:3828: [51] avadadhire ca tan-nikaṭa-taṭasthaṃ bhāsamāna-hāsa-vilāsa-mukham ulūkhalaṃ karṣantaṃ līlā-sukhaṃ varṣantaṃ bāla-gopālam /
GK19gp01-11u:3832: [53] pitā cāntaḥ-sambhrāntaḥ sann api tasya sāntvanāya mukha-mātraṃ hasita-pātram ācarann acirād eva taṃ vipāśayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3833: [54] sa-rodana-vadanaṃ vadanaṃ cumban vidann api muhuḥ papraccha ca,
GK19gp01-11u:3835: kutratyaḥ sa khalu khala-buddhir yena colūkhale nirbandha-janita-baddhas tvam asi? iti /
GK19gp01-11u:3836: [55] sa tu pitari rataś cirataḥ śliṣṭa-kaṇṭhatayābhyarṇam āgataḥ karṇe varṇayāmāsa,
GK19gp01-11u:3839: [56] pitā tu tāṃ pūrvaṃ vigata-saṃvedatayā anantaraṃ tu svata eva jāta-nirvedatayā dūnāṃ veda sma /
GK19gp01-11u:3840: tata eva na sahasā rahasāpi paribhāṣitum iyeṣa /
GK19gp01-11u:3844: sphuṭam anena kṛta-madhya-gamanena vistīrṇa-khale pura-sthale krīḍituṃ niṣkramya,
GK19gp01-11u:3845: vikṛṣṭa-tale tiryag-bhāvād acale cāsminn ulūkhale khaṭat-khaṭiti truṭitatām ṛcchat kuṭha-dvayaṃ jhaṭiti luṭhad-bhāvam ānarccha /
GK19gp01-11u:3846: [58] tataś ca khaṇḍitābhyām ābhyāṃ nirgatya kaṭaka-mukuṭa-kuṇḍalādi-maṇḍitau rociṣmad-vapuṣmantau śuṣmāṇau praṇamantau samantād etaṃ kim api santoṣayāmāsatuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3849: bālānāṃ pralāpo' yam iti vatsalāḥ kalayāmbabhūvuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3851: [60] tataś ca kramād eka-dvy-ādi-prakramān militena vraja-janena samaṃ vraja-bhūpālaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:3852: sva-bālakenāṅkaṃ sad alaṅkṛtya nitya-kṛtya-kṛte kālindīm anuvindamānas tenānuṣajya
GK19gp01-11u:3857: [61] taj-jāyā tu taj-jābhyāṃ duḥkha-lajjābhyāṃ sajjatī gṛhād āgrahāc ca na niṣkrāntavatī,
GK19gp01-11u:3861: [62] śrī-vraja-rājas tv avarātmajaṃ rāmam api samānīya tena sutena ca sārdhaṃ tayoḥ snigdha-kala-kolāhala-nidigdhaḥ sagdhim ācaritavān /
GK19gp01-11u:3862: tābhyāṃ mūrta-paramānanda-pūrtābhyāṃ muhūrtam ekaṃ viśramya ca samyag-īdṛg-auśīra-sukha-dhīra-cetā gavāgamana-ramya-samaye gosthānam āgamya go-dohanādi-kāryaṃ ca kārayati sma /
GK19gp01-11u:3863: [63] udavasitād atisitāṃ sitām ānāyya tayā sahitaṃ suhitaṃ saha sa-vayobhis tanayau stana-pāna-pratinidhitayā dhāroṣṇaṃ payaḥ pāyayāmāsa ca
GK19gp01-11u:3865: [64] atha punar api harmyam āgamya tābhyām ācarita-sāyam-bhojana-sukha-samāje vraja-rāje,
GK19gp01-11u:3866: saha-rohiṇīkās tadīya-santata-sukhābhīkāḥ svakula-māṇikya-lakṣmyaḥ sarvāḥ prāmāṇikyaḥ samāsādya nivedavatyaḥ-
GK19gp01-11u:3869: tām anu sarvāś ca tathā vartante /
GK19gp01-11u:3871: roṣam anuvartamānā svayam eva sva-doṣaṃ paśyatu /
GK19gp01-11u:3874: sā khalv antar bahir apy atikomalā tavedṛśā-lāpena tāpenātimlāsyati /
GK19gp01-11u:3878: kintu tvām eva samayā samayān gamayiṣyāmi /
GK19gp01-11u:3879: [70] atha rāja-jyāyaḥ-prajāvatyaḥ sahāsam ūcuḥ-stanaṃ kasya pāsyasi?
GK19gp01-11u:3885: [75] kṛṣṇaḥ sa-roṣāsram uvāca-māṃ vihāyeyam apīyāya iti /
GK19gp01-11u:3886: [76] tad etad ākarṇya sāsrā rohiṇī nīcair uvāca-putra,
GK19gp01-11u:3889: [77] kṛṣṇas tad etad aśrṇvann iva sāsraṃ pitṛ-mukham īkṣate sma /
GK19gp01-11u:3890: rohiṇī tu saṅkarṣaṇaṃ tasya saṅkarṣaṇāya sañjñayā jñāpayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3891: tena gṛhīta-hastaḥ punar asau nirasta-tad-dhastatayā vidrutya pitur utsaṅga-saṅgī babhūva /
GK19gp01-11u:3892: tathābhavaṃś ca bhujābhyām avaguṇṭhita-tat-kaṇṭhaḥ kṛta-bāṣpa-vṛṣṭiṃ tad-dṛṣṭim eva paśyaṃs tam atīva vaśyam ācarann āsīt /
GK19gp01-11u:3893: [78] vraja-rājas tu mātary antaḥ-sneham asya paryālocya tad abhivyaktaye hastaṃ kiñcid udastaṃ vidhāyābhidadhe-putra,
GK19gp01-11u:3896: kṛṣṇas tu tad asahamānas tasya hastaṃ stambhayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3897: [79] tato vraja-rājaḥ punar vihasya nija-vatsalatayātīva sadayaṃ tadīya-mātur api hṛdayam adhiyan-putra,
GK19gp01-11u:3900: ity anadhātor viruddhārthaṃ prayujya sa-parihāsam āha sma /
GK19gp01-11u:3901: [80] kṛṣṇas tu bālaka-bhāvenājasraṃ mātari sa-tṛṣṇaḥ sāsraṃ,
GK19gp01-11u:3903: tatra gamyatām iti sa-śaṅkaṃ rohiṇy-aṅkaṃ gatavān /
GK19gp01-11u:3904: [81] tataś ca, prahasita-kalakaleṣu sakaleṣu parama-sukhārohiṇyā rohiṇyānītaḥ so' pi veśma praviśya sa-rodana-modam ambālā-galaṃ lagnavān / tataś ca-
GK19gp01-11u:3909: [82] atha tāsāṃ tv aneka-sāntvanayā labdha-śāntiḥ kiñcid vyañjita-mukha-kāntiḥ śrī-sumukha-kanyeyaṃ stanyena tanayaṃ prīṇayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3910: bubhuje ca sahāgrajātena tena parama-hitābhiḥ sahitā /
GK19gp01-11u:3911: [83] tad ārabhya tu saṅkocaṃ upalabhya vrajarāja-locana-gocaratāṃ vāsara-trayaṃ nāsāditavatī /
GK19gp01-11u:3912: dināntare tu pitṛ-nideśa-pāla-bāla-gopālenaiva celāñcale gṛhītvā nītā /
GK19gp01-11u:3913: tad-dinaś ca sa-narmāmodaṃ dāmodaraḥ iti vraja-vadhūbhir āhūyate sma,
GK19gp01-11u:3919: [84] so' yam asyā bādarāyaṇinā ghaṭita-samyag-udghaṭṭanaḥ śrīmān yaśaḥ-paṭaha-śabdas trailokyam eva ślokyatayā paryaṭann asti /
GK19gp01-11u:3921: [85] śrī-rāmas tu nijānujaṃ sa-tṛṣṇam āha sma,
GK19gp01-11u:3929: yau vṛkṣāv api tau svasya divya-bhaktau vinirmame //JGc_1,8.41// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:3930: [88] tad evaṃ vṛtte vṛtte sarve tat-tat-kathāṃ api tat-tat-parvaivānubhūya svaṃ svam āvāsam āsannavantaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3936: [1] atha dināntare bhāsamānāyāṃ sabhāyāṃ śrī-vrajarājaḥ paryanuyuktavān,
GK19gp01-11u:3938: tau khalu vṛkṣau vraje saṅkalpa-pradatayā devatā-sadṛkṣau /
GK19gp01-11u:3942: [2] snigdhakaṇṭha uvāca-pūrvaṃ dhūrjaṭi-mitrād utpannavantau śrī-devarṣi-varye dhārṣṭyam anuṣṭhitavantau santau,
GK19gp01-11u:3943: pariṇāmataḥ paramānugraheṇa śrī-devarṣi-varya-kṛta-nigraheṇa vṛkṣatāyām api bhavagad-bhaktatām āgatavantau /
GK19gp01-11u:3944: pratibhavad-avatāram udbhavatas tasya bṛhadvana-stha-bhavad-gṛhasya tu sadeśe deśe yamalārjuna-veśena sthitavantau /
GK19gp01-11u:3945: etad-anantaraṃ ca nija-gatim āgatavantau parama-bhagavad-bhaktimantau ca jātavantau /
GK19gp01-11u:3946: samprati tu tad-bhakti-phala-vyaktim apy ākalayantau vartete /
GK19gp01-11u:3949: [4] atha snigdhakaṇṭhaḥ sva-mukha-kamalaṃ namayitvā tuṣṇīm iva sthitvā ca madhukaṇṭhaṃ kaṭākṣeṇekṣāñcakre /
GK19gp01-11u:3950: [5] vrajarāja uvāca-saṅkucann iva kathaṃ nocitavān asi?
GK19gp01-11u:3954: [7] vrajarājaḥ sasmitam uvāca-satyaṃ bhavad-uktaṃ punar-uktam eva bhavet,
GK19gp01-11u:3955: yato bhavato maunam evātra bravītīti rīti-vaśāj jñātavanta eva ca vayam /
GK19gp01-11u:3956: tathāpi, sva-mukhena sukhena yojayatu bhavān asmān /
GK19gp01-11u:3957: [8] snigdhakaṇṭha uvāca-sarva-sukha-varṣi-śrī-devarṣi-caraṇānāṃ kṛpaṇa-viṣaya-kṛpā-kpta-tad-etad-gatī labdhamatī tāv eva sphuṭam āvām iti /
GK19gp01-11u:3958: [9] tad etad ākarṇya nirvarṇita-tan-mukhāḥ śrī-vrajarāja-pramukhāḥ samāhūya bhūyaḥ sa-kautukaṃ sa-sukhaṃ tau militavantaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3960: [10] punas tu tat-praśnānantaraṃ madhukaṇṭhaḥ krama-prāptāṃ kathāṃ prāha,
GK19gp01-11u:3961: [11] tad evaṃ vicitrāt pūrva-caritrād divasa-pañcakānantaraṃ śrīmān upanandaḥ sva-mandiraṃ vindamānaḥ sva-patnīṃ papraccha,
GK19gp01-11u:3962: adya sva-devara-nara-deva-gṛhe kiṃ gamana-maṅgalaṃ jagṛhe bhavatyā?
GK19gp01-11u:3964: ko vā tad gamanaṃ vinā mano mānayituṃ śaknoti,
GK19gp01-11u:3968: yasmin prema-pracuraṃ bhayam api tasmin vibhāvyate pracuram /
GK19gp01-11u:3969: yadvan netraṃ śaṅkā-viṣayas tadvan na karṇādi //JGc_1,9.1// [gīti]
GK19gp01-11u:3970: [15] tathā hi, yadyapi niravadyādhāna-vidhātṛ-mātṛ-prabhṛtibhī rakṣyete sabhībhir eva tau,
GK19gp01-11u:3971: tathāpi khela-velāyāṃ sambhālayitum apāraṇīyatayā sukalam eva vikalayataḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:3974: yaśodāyāṃ tadīya-sāhāyakā-rohiṇyām api rohiṇyām āśaṅkā-pātrīr dhātrīr vañcayitvā
GK19gp01-11u:3976: dhātrīṇām aparatra karmaṇi manāg dattātmanām agrataḥ
GK19gp01-11u:3977: savyāsavya-dṛśor dṛśor aviṣaye sāntarddhi-deśe ca tau /
GK19gp01-11u:3980: [17] atha tathā nikṛtas tat-pālanādhikṛta-dhātrī-vargaḥ kṣaṇāt kṛtāvadhāna-sargaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:3981: śīghram eva kṛtānumārgaḥ krameṇa svasyākāraṇam akāraṇatām āsāditam avadhārya nijeśvaryor āvedayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3982: [18] tāvac ca tato' py atidūraṃ gambhīra-sarit-tīraṃ gatāv ākarṇya pūtanā-sūdana-prasū rāmāmbālām eva tayoḥ saṅkalanāya cālayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3983: æhanta, na jāne khalv arjuna-yugalavad durjana-preryamāṇatayā kaścid anokaho vā nadyavaroho vā skhalatīti mayi pāka-karma-vipākāvaruddhāyāṃ satvaraṃ tvam eva svayaṃ yāhi' iti /
GK19gp01-11u:3984: sā ca tatra gatā śīghraṃ vyagrī-bhūtāṅga-mānasā /
GK19gp01-11u:3986: [19] tataś ca krīḍā-raṅgākulatayā tad anaṅgīkartari saṅgīśitari kṛṣṇe kṛṣṇāgraje ca tad-anuga-tṛṣṇe,
GK19gp01-11u:3987: sā parivṛtya sadmāgatya tasya kiñcid bhaya-sthānaṃ prabhava-sthānam eva prasthāpayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:3990: vīkṣya stana-miṣāt snehaṃ varṣantī hūtim ātanot //JGc_1,9.4// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:3991: [21] na tu sahasā samīpam āpa tat-palāyana-śaṅkayā /
GK19gp01-11u:3997: [22] tathāpi mithaḥ saṅgharṣayataḥ krīḍā-tarṣavantaṃ tam anāgacchantaṃ dharṣayantī,
GK19gp01-11u:3998: vicchiduratā-vidhur asajātīya-snehasya dvitīya-pātram ādṛta-sva-vacana-mātratayāvaśyam eva vaśyaṃ śrī-bala-bhadram eva sānukrośaṃ cukrośa-
GK19gp01-11u:4000: prātar eva kṛtāhāraḥ krīḍāśrānto' pi putraka //
GK19gp01-11u:4004: [23] tato mātṛ-harṣaṇāya nivartayituṃ kṛṣṇaṃ karṣati saṅkarṣaṇe,
GK19gp01-11u:4007: janmarkṣaṃ te' dya bhavati viprebhyo dehi gāḥ śuciḥ //[BhP 10.11.18]
GK19gp01-11u:4008: [24] punas tadānīm eva gṛhād āgatān bālān ākalayya spṛhāṃ bṛṃhayantī babhāṣe,
GK19gp01-11u:4010: tvaṃ ca snātaḥ kṛtāhāro viharasva svalaṅkṛtaḥ //[BhP 10.11.19]
GK19gp01-11u:4011: [25] tad evaṃ bālyam evārabhya vipra-poṣaṇād ātmanas toṣa iti tad ārambhāya stambhamānam
GK19gp01-11u:4012: āhvānādi-lakṣyeṇa laghu laghu samīpam āsannā sa-rāmaṃ rāmānujaṃ bhujayor gṛhītvā gṛham ānināya /
GK19gp01-11u:4013: [26] tataś ca, janmarkṣaṃ te iti mithyā-kathyamānam api tena gṛhītaṃ nitarām eva gṛhītavatī vrajarāja-gṛhiṇī tat parva,
GK19gp01-11u:4014: yatra duṣṭa-dṛṣṭi-nivāraṇāya sa-yantrā mantrā muhur vinyāsam ūhuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:4015: [27] tad evam avadhāya sa sarva-darśaḥ śrīmān upanandaḥ parāmamarśa,
GK19gp01-11u:4016: satyam āśaṅkitaṃ prajāṃ prati prajāvatyor anayoḥ prajāvatyoḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:4017: yad idaṃ goṣṭha-prakoṣṭham avaduṣṭam iva dṛśyate /
GK19gp01-11u:4019: [28] tatpatnī prāha-vicāraḥ punas tatrabhavaty eva sthāsyate /
GK19gp01-11u:4020: [29] atha prātar eva go-vraja-vrajānta-sthāyāṃ sarvāsthāspada-vrajarāja-samāja-rājamānāyām āsthānyāṃ militā gopālā gopāla-nādi-saukaryaṃ nātreti
GK19gp01-11u:4022: tatra tu vayo-jñānābhyāṃ vṛddhaḥ śrī-rāma-kṛṣṇa-premṇā samṛddhaḥ svāṅka-palyaṅkaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:4023: sad-alaṅkariṣṇunā madhye madhye ca cibukaṃ gṛhītvā vitatha-praśnam ācariṣṇunā tat
GK19gp01-11u:4024: tadā krīḍanaka-yācñā-satṛṣṇena kṛṣṇena labhyamānānandaḥ śrīmān upanandaḥ prāvocad akhila-rocanam /
GK19gp01-11u:4025: iha ca vrajarājasya saṅkocam avalocayan bāla-prajā-mātrasya hita-pakṣam upalakṣayāmāsa / yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:4026: æiha na stheyam' itītthaṃ vraja-hitam uktaṃ bhavadbhir yat /
GK19gp01-11u:4027: tat punar atibālānāṃ hita-pradhānaṃ mama sphurati //JGc_1,9.5// [upagīti]
GK19gp01-11u:4028: sahajani-janite yan mama para-para-yatnena rakṣite' py atra /
GK19gp01-11u:4032: tasmin bhāraṃ dadyād iti ca na khalu tat-parair iṣṭam //JGc_1,9.7// [udgīti]
GK19gp01-11u:4038: yad iha paratra ca ghaṭeta duḥkhāya /
GK19gp01-11u:4039: bṛhad-ākhyaṃ vanam anupadam aihika-duḥkhāya sāmprataṃ jātam //JGc_1,9.9// [gīti]
GK19gp01-11u:4041: yad iha paratra ca ghaṭeta saukhyāya /
GK19gp01-11u:4042: vṛndāvanāraṇyaṃ cādaḥ samasta-sukhatamam atīva puṇyaṃ ca //JGc_1,9.10// [gīti]
GK19gp01-11u:4043: govardhana iti nāmā yatrāraṇye giriḥ sphurati /
GK19gp01-11u:4044: tat khalu go-jātīnāṃ gopānāṃ cāsti sarvasvam //JGc_1,9.11// [upagīti]

GK19gp01-11u:4356: rāma-dāmādibhiḥ sahitaṃ sahitaṃ sā punaḥ karpūra-rasa-pūra-pūrṇa-khapura-pūrita-sacūrṇa-svarṇa-varṇa-parṇa-puṭa-dāna-puraḥ-saram evam avādīt,

GK19gp01-11u:4358: [24] atha kiñcid dūraṃ gatvā tasya teṣāṃ ca khelā-melābhiniveśaṃ matvā grīvāṃ parāvartya nartyamāna-nayanatayā samarthāṃs tat-pālakān bālakān praty uvāca-are re,
GK19gp01-11u:4359: śīghram evāyaṃ prāṇayanīyo vraja-dharaṇīśa-praṇayinyāḥ prāṇasya prāṇaḥ iti /
GK19gp01-11u:4360: [25] tad evaṃ gatāsu tāsu sāgrajaḥ sa tu duṣparihara-bāṣpa-cchedya-sa-puṣpa- tṛṇa-mukhān
GK19gp01-11u:4361: vatsān vrajābhimukhān vidhāya śanaiś cārayan gāyan nṛtyan hasan krīḍan divi-carair
GK19gp01-11u:4362: brāhmaṇair brāhmaṇaiḥ stūyamānaḥ sumanobhiś ca sumanobhir vṛṣyamāṇaḥ svagṛhāya vartma jagṛhe /
GK19gp01-11u:4363: [26] tataś ca vatsāvāsaṃ yāvat sāgraja-mitra-vrajatayā yathākramaṃ vikramamānas tatra
GK19gp01-11u:4364: ca vatsān saṅkṛtya kṛta-kṛtyatayā ramamāṇas tal-lāvaṇya-darśanena harṣamānas tat
GK19gp01-11u:4365: prāg eva sarvair vraja-vāsibhir upavrajyamānaḥ snānādi-pūrvakaṃ divyam ambaraṃ valayamānaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:4366: śīghram eva bhojanaṃ bhajamānaḥ punar api go-dohana-bhūmi-gamanena sukhaṃ yajamānas
GK19gp01-11u:4367: tat-tan-mātṛ-nāmabhir vatsān hvayamānaḥ sambhramatas tad-gamana-vyatikramāt prahāsa-maya-mānaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:4368: pradugdhāni dugdhāni ca tāni kiṅkara-nikareṇa gṛhaṃ hārayamāṇaḥ punar ālayam āgamya
GK19gp01-11u:4369: kṣaṇa-katipayaṃ mātaram ānandya tām anu vindamānaś candra-śālikāṃ viśramāya śrayamāṇaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:4371: prasvāpya ca taṃ ca taṃ ca sā ca sā ca mātā paritaḥ parijana-kumārān
GK19gp01-11u:4373: [27] tad evaṃ dina-katipaye parama-ramaṇena gamita-samaye sa tu nṛśaṃsaḥ kaṃsa-nāmā
GK19gp01-11u:4375: [28] hanta, satyatā-sāreṇa devyā vacanānusāreṇa nanda-gopa-ḍimbhatā-dambha eva sa ko' pi gopitaḥ sambhāvyate,
GK19gp01-11u:4376: yena nūtanāvayavenāpi duḥsaha-mahasaḥ pūtanādayaḥ sahasā gāmbhīryāvṛttena vīryātiśayenālambhanīyatāṃ lambhitāḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:4377: trasyati ca tasya nāma-dhāma-vaśān mama hṛdayam /
GK19gp01-11u:4379: hanta, chalān apy uttaram uttaram atiriktaṃ yuktam eva te prayuktavantaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:4381: punar api taṃ praṇidhiṃ sannidhiṃ nikāyyataḥ samānāyya papraccha, aye,
GK19gp01-11u:4383: jātau kasyāṃ tasyādaraḥ sneha-bharaś ca paramaḥ parāmṛśyate?
GK19gp01-11u:4386: [30] kaṃsa uvāca-samyag gamyatāṃ nijam eva harmyam /
GK19gp01-11u:4387: punaś cānyam uvāca-ākāryatāṃ purataḥ sa vatsāsuraḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:4389: sa-sambhrama-vikrama-kramatayā tenānīya samarpitaḥ pānīya-lavavad drava-pravaṇatāvastha eva tasthau /
GK19gp01-11u:4390: tena ca sambandhatām āśaṃsan pāṃśu-saṅghaval labdha-dhvaṃsaḥ kaṃsas tūpāṃśu taṃ sutam iva śaśaṃsa,
GK19gp01-11u:4393: gatvā ca vatsāṃś cārayataḥ kumārayatas tat-kumārasya sadeśam āsādya nijaṃ vatsa-veśam utpādya tasyāpakāram ārabhasva /
GK19gp01-11u:4394: [31] tataḥ sa ca, yathājñāpayanti rājñām ājñāpakāḥ iti tad-vacanānupathātmā tat pratiśāsanād atrāsam eva tatrājagāma /
GK19gp01-11u:4395: yatra svacche vatsa-krīḍana-nāmani yāmuna-kacche tad-vidha-māraka-karmā vraja-rāja-janmā vatsān mānayan nayana-viṣayaṃ viṣa-dharam iva taṃ cakāra
GK19gp01-11u:4396: [32] atha matsaratas tata itaḥ saratas tasya gandhānusandhānataḥ kṛtsnān khaṭa-deśam
GK19gp01-11u:4397: aṭataḥ śakṛtkarīn vyagraṃ paśyataḥ paśyann agrajaṃ vrajarāja-tanūjanū rahaḥ sa-vyājaṃ vyajahāra,
GK19gp01-11u:4399: prātar anāyātaḥ paricīyate vā ko' yam upatoyaṃ pratīyate vatsaḥ?
GK19gp01-11u:4406: yasmād asmāsu vatseṣu cākasmād adṛṣṭijādṛṣṭir asya dṛśyate /
GK19gp01-11u:4407: [38] kṛṣṇa uvāca-yadi bhavad-ādiṣṭaṃ syāt tarhy etaṃ diṣṭāntam āsādayāmi /
GK19gp01-11u:4409: [40] kṛṣṇa uvāca-maraṇe ditya-patyatā param āgatya pratyakṣī-bhaviṣyaty asya /
GK19gp01-11u:4412: sacchalam etaṃ sacchalam eva mandaṃ mandam abhyavaskanda /

GK19gp01-11u:4414: sarvataḥ krīḍan gāyan parva tanvann ivāsīt /

GK19gp01-11u:4420: krīḍāyāḥ phala-pātanārtham iva ca kṣipte kapitthopari
GK19gp01-11u:4421: jñātṛtvaṃ naṭavat kalāṃ ca pṛthukās te tasya śaślāghire //JGc_1,10.10// [śārdūla]
GK19gp01-11u:4422: atha devaiḥ prasūnāni vṛṣṭāni hasitāni ca /

GK19gp01-11u:4424: [44] tad anu ca parihāsa-bhāsamāna-hāsaṃ divya-sabhāsadas tad idam avadaṃś ca,
GK19gp01-11u:4425: nūnam etad eva deva-vairi-vairiṇas tātparyaṃ paryavasyati /
GK19gp01-11u:4426: vayaṃ gāṃ gopālāḥ paricinumahe tad-dviṣam api
GK19gp01-11u:4429: kathaṃ te mokṣaḥ syād iha laṣasi cet pretya bhavatu //
GK19gp01-11u:4432: tau vatsād api rakṣantau sarvaṃ lokaṃ rarakṣatuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:4434: [45] tataś ca tad-dine' pi śrī-kṛṣṇa-rāmayoḥ svadhāma-samāgamanaṃ jātam,
GK19gp01-11u:4435: kintu tad-vṛttam aniṣṭam iti tad-iṣṭa-gaṇaḥ sarva evāvariṣṭa /
GK19gp01-11u:4436: tac ca, na jāne kiṃ-vadantī kiṃvadantī syād,

GK19gp01-11u:4440: sa tu mantribhiḥ kathañcid bahir avadhāpitaḥ sārdham eva tair idam acāru vicārayāmāsa,
GK19gp01-11u:4442: na tu tair bhadraṃ kiñcid api sañcitam /

GK19gp01-11u:4455: yatra tulya-paryāyatayā dambha eva gahvarāyate sma /

GK19gp01-11u:4457: kūlam anusthāpayantaḥ svayam api payaḥ-pānam ayantaḥ parasparaṃ snapayantaḥ samutthāya
GK19gp01-11u:4459: kalāpayantaś ca puṣpāharaṇāya parataḥ pracāram āceruḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:4460: tam ācarantaś ca taṃ bakam īkṣāmāsur utprekṣāmāsuś ca: aho,

GK19gp01-11u:4471: [50] atra tatra jigamiṣann eva samiṣa-śliṣṭatāviśiṣṭaṃ kūṭa-śabdaṃ paṭhitavān /
GK19gp01-11u:4472: [51] atha samuddaṇḍa-daṇḍa-varaṇḍa-sakhi-maṇḍala-maṇḍitaḥ puṇḍarīka-locanas taṃ jānann apy ajānann iva tasya tuṇḍa-sannidhim eva gamane' vadhiñcakāra
GK19gp01-11u:4474: [52] tataś ca gaṇḍūpadaṃ manyamānaḥ sa ca maṇḍūka iva kuṇḍali-pogaṇḍaṃ taṃ nijagāra,

GK19gp01-11u:4483: [53] atha bakaḥ sva-kaṇṭhāvaṭe kṛpīṭa-yonivat kapaṭa-tejaskaṃ taṃ jhaṭity ujjagāra /
GK19gp01-11u:4484: tataś ca, so' yaṃ mama hṛdayam abhrākṣīd iti vibhāvya punas tan nigaraṇa-yogyaṃ nādrākṣīt,
GK19gp01-11u:4485: kintu tataḥ parāṅ-mukhaḥ sa punar baka iva mūrkhaḥ sura-śātrava-bakas tejo-mātra-gātratayāvagatam api taṃ troṭi-koṭibhyāṃ troṭayitum udayuṅkta
GK19gp01-11u:4486: [54] sa tu śauṭīrya-koṭīśvaras tat-troṭī karābhyāṃ vighaṭayaṃs taṃ sa-pāṭavaṃ pāṭayāmāsa,
GK19gp01-11u:4493: [55] yatra vṛndārakā dārakāś ca kramān mumudire / yathā-

GK19gp01-11u:4504: yasmin bakāsyād udite' pi te' rbhakā
GK19gp01-11u:4508: [57] atha sarve samaya-vyagratayā śīghram eva tasmin sarasi militvā snātvā taṃ pradeśaṃ hitvā kṛṣṇaṃ gṛhītvā gṛhāya pratasthire /
GK19gp01-11u:4512: tathā śiśu-kṛtā mṛtir evam abhūd iti //
GK19gp01-11u:4514: tad-vārtā-yugalena gokula-bhuvāṃ dagdhaṃ ca siktaṃ ca yat
GK19gp01-11u:4515: pratyaṅgaṃ tad idaṃ layāya bhavitety evaṃ janaiḥ śaṅkitam /
GK19gp01-11u:4516: paścāt pratyuta romaharṣam adadhād yat tat tu yuktaṃ parā
