GK19gp01-11u:4518: [58] tataś ca te sarve samudvignam uditāḥ samuditā vitrāsānanda-nispandaṃ śrīman-nanda-mandira-jana-vṛndam
GK19gp01-11u:4519: anuvindamānāḥ śrī-govinda-vadanāravindam asra-sanditāḥ sandarīdṛśya parāmṛśya ca
GK19gp01-11u:4520: bakāntānām aśāntānāṃ maraṇe kāraṇaṃ parasparam ūcuḥ-
GK19gp01-11u:4521: asya bālasya kiṃ pūrvaṃ kim apūrvaṃ vrajeśituḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:4522: kim arthaṃ vā pūrvam āgas te cakrus te hatā yataḥ //JGc_1,10.22// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:4523: [59] tad evaṃ prapañce' vatīrṇānām api śrīman-nandādīnāṃ tad-varṇanānandād adīnānāṃ prapañca-dharmeṇa saṅkīrṇatāṃ na varṇayāmāsuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:4526: kurvanto ramamānāś ca nāvindan bhava-vedanām //[BhP 10.11.58] iti /
GK19gp01-11u:4527: [60] tad etad baka-nirgranthanam ugram ugrasena-duṣputraḥ śrotreṇāpīya vyagra-cetā babhūva,
GK19gp01-11u:4532: [61] sarva-māyā-maya-maya-tanayaḥ prakhyāta-bala-valayaḥ sa hi mahīyān iti padmāvatī-jaraṭha-jaṭhara-janmā saṃmānanayā tam ānāyya tat-kāryāya paryāpayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:4533: [62] sa cāgamya vyoma-nāmā kṛta-vyomāvalambatayā nyakṣeṇa vīkṣamāṇaḥ kāmyakāraṇya-dharaṇī-dhara-sannidhānataḥ
GK19gp01-11u:4535: śrī-rohiṇy-arbhakaṃ vinā samāyātaṃ dadarśa vimamarśa ca-
GK19gp01-11u:4542: yatra ca meṣā moṣyamāṇā api na bhāṣante /
GK19gp01-11u:4543: poṣakāś ca teṣāṃ bahalānāṃ sambhālanāya durbalāyante,
GK19gp01-11u:4545: ayaṃ tu tat-poṣakāyamāṇaḥ śyāma-dhāmā kumāraḥ prabhākara-sahasra-prabhāva-bhāvitatayā nāsmad-vidha-sannidheya-sannidhānas tarkyate /
GK19gp01-11u:4546: tathāpy asmākam ayam evāvasaro varo nāvaro varaṇīyatām anusarati /
GK19gp01-11u:4547: atra hi tasya niravadhānasya bahiś-cara-prāṇa-tulāṃ valamānā bālakā vinaivārtiṃ hartavyā bhaveyuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:4548: tato vyagrībhūtaḥ so' yam agrīyaś ca vinā vigrahaṃ grahītavyatām ṛcchet, sāmikṛtaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:4550: tad etad vicārayaṃś cora-vad-ācāra-gopa-dāraka-prakāras tadīya-niviḍa-krīḍāyāṃ praviveśa /
GK19gp01-11u:4552: niviḍa-kānana-kṛta-praveśatayā poṣakābhiniveśam atikrāmatas tān moṣāyamānān kramaśaś catuḥ-pañcāvaśeṣam apakramayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:4553: apakramyāpakramya ca giri-guhāyāṃ nigūhayamānaḥ punaḥ punar ayamānaḥ peśaskaritānusārī prastarāstaraṇatas tad-dvāram āvavāra /
GK19gp01-11u:4554: [64] etaj jñātvā nirjarāri-prahārī śiṣṭān kaṣṭantaṃ harantaṃ kumārān vyagrī-bhūtaḥ siṃhavad grāma-siṃhaṃ vidrutyārād agrahīn nyagrahīc ca /
GK19gp01-11u:4559: [65] tad evaṃ saṃhata-saṃhananam apy etaṃ niḥsandhi-bandhanaṃ visṛjya tat-pada-paddhatiṃ saṃsṛjya tad-gupti-dvāram anusasāra / tataś ca,
GK19gp01-11u:4581: [66] atra vyomaṃ diṣṭānta-daṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā kusuma-vṛṣṭi-kṛdbhir dānava-dveṣṭṛbhir ayaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇābhiprāyaḥ spaṣṭaṃ parāmṛṣṭaḥ-
GK19gp01-11u:4583: vyomas tvaṃ vyomatāṃ prāptas tasmāc cet karavāṇi kim? //JGc_1,10.29// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:4586: vatsādi-trayam āninye līlayā yas tu pañcatām //JGc_1,10.30// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:4587: [68] tad evam amī sākṣād iva vyoma-vadham anubhūya bhūyasā sukhena vilasan-mukhena lalitā gṛhāya calitā babhūvuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:4593: [1] atha pūrvavat prabhātataḥ prabhātāyāṃ sabhāyāṃ madhukaṇṭhaḥ sotkaṇṭham uvāca-
GK19gp01-11u:4594: [2] tad evaṃ pūrvavad eva devana-kutukataḥ pūrvadeva-mārayoḥ kumārayor anayoḥ kaumāram ativṛtta-kalpam āsīt / [3] yau khalu,
GK19gp01-11u:4596: cāpalyena muner api sma kurutaś cittaṃ milac-cāpalam /
GK19gp01-11u:4599: [4] atha kadācid atiprātar agrato jāgrato nija-vihārato jagad eva pātuḥ śrī-rāma-bhrātur yādṛcchikīyam icchā jātā /
GK19gp01-11u:4600: prātar-bhojanam apy adya nirjana-vana eva yojanīyam iti /
GK19gp01-11u:4601: tataś ca kṛta-prātaḥ-kriyas tat-prārthanāya racita-mātṛ-priyas tad-anujñayā gacchan śṛṅga-rava-sañjñayā sāgrajaṃ sakhi-vrajaṃ jāgarayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:4602: jhaṭiti cāṭitvā śṛṅgāṭaka-madhyam adhyāsya kṣaṇa-katipayaṃ tat pratīkṣaṇaṃ pratīkṣaṇaṃ vyāpārayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:4603: [5] śayyotthāyāṃ vidrutya militeṣu savayaḥ-sama-vāyeṣu rāmam āgamayitum ūrdhvaṃ vartamānas tan-mānavena vārtānuvartayāmāse /
GK19gp01-11u:4604: [6] yathā ca provāca tad vācikam asau-hanta bhoḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:4606: tvayā saha krīḍā-tṛṣṇag apy ahaṃ viruddha-vidhinā niruddha evāsmi,
GK19gp01-11u:4607: yad akasmāt kasmād api puru-kulajanmā man-mātulaḥ paramātula-nirbandhān mām avalokayitum āgamya harmya eva sthāvara-sādharmyam āsāditavān asti
GK19gp01-11u:4608: adya ca tavātīva prātar ātta-jāgaratayā samīhita-viśeṣam ūhitavān asmi /
GK19gp01-11u:4609: tasmād bhavatā yā līlā bhāvayituṃ bhāvitā,
GK19gp01-11u:4611: navyārambhe viṣkambhaḥ khalv apratibaddha-siddhi-sambhāvanāṃ stambhayati iti /
GK19gp01-11u:4612: [7] atha varṇyamāṇaṃ tad ākarṇya sa ca kamala-savarṇatā-vilasad-ākarṇa-locanaḥ pratipanna-krīḍā-rocanaḥ sakhīn uvāca-bhavatu /
GK19gp01-11u:4613: bhavanta eva sva-sva-bhavanād vihaṅgikāyāṃ kācam āyojya bhojya-bhakta-bhakta-niyojyajanaṃ prayojya tat tad upayojyam ānāyya vanāya gamanāya tvarayantu /
GK19gp01-11u:4614: asmaj-jananī ca bhavyānāṃ bhājana-bhṛta-bhojana-dravyāṇāṃ drutam eva sajjana-vargeṇāsmabhyaṃ visarjanam arjayiṣyati iti nijehite tathā vihite,
GK19gp01-11u:4616: yatra ca vatsa-pāla-bālakāḥ pratighasraṃ sahasraśa eva tena miśratayā viśrūyante /
GK19gp01-11u:4618: kṛṣṇa-vatsānāṃ saṅkhyā punar asaṅkhya-sañjñā saṅgīyate / tataś ca-
GK19gp01-11u:4621: kṛṣṇaś calann atha vanāya balasya cittaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:4624: [8] atha gahanaṃ gāhamānā maṇi-jāta-rūpābhyāṃ suṣṭhu jāta-rūpā api bālāḥ phala-pravālādibhir alaṅkṛtam ātmānaṃ kṛtavantaḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:4625: yathā nikāyye duryāca-kāca-guñjā-puñjam apy upayuñjate sma /
GK19gp01-11u:4626: nahi vilāsa-bahulatākulānām idaṃ na tat tulam iti vicāraḥ sañcarati /
GK19gp01-11u:4627: kārpaṇyam eva khalu paṇyaṃ gaṇyatāṃ nayati,
GK19gp01-11u:4628: vilāsitā punar dṛśyatām eva parāmṛśya hṛṣyatīti /
GK19gp01-11u:4629: [9] atha te śikyitānna-pātrāṇi vṛkṣa-śākhāsv avalambita-gātrāṇi vidhāya kṛṣṇa-bhrū-bhaṅga-taraṅga-saṅgata-raṅgatayā cāpalya-viśeṣaṃ śleṣayāmāsuḥ
GK19gp01-11u:4630: muṣṇanto' nyo' nya-śikyādīn jñātān ārāc ca cikṣipuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:4631: tatratyāś ca punar dūrād hasantaś ca punar daduḥ //[BhP 10.12 /5] iti /
GK19gp01-11u:4633: yaṣṭy-āder narmaṇāsann apaharaṇa-karā ye hṛta-svās tathā ye
GK19gp01-11u:4634: dūre ye kṣepakā ye pratiharaṇa-kṛtas te ca te cāśu sarve /
GK19gp01-11u:4636: pratyekaṃ svīya-yogyaṃ nigamanam avidus tatra naivānyad anyat //
GK19gp01-11u:4638: [11] tad evam eva saṃyogād yathā tad-eka-sukha-yoga eva teṣāṃ bhogas tathā viyogād api, yathā:
GK19gp01-11u:4639: yadi dūraṃ gataḥ kṛṣṇo vana-śobhekṣaṇāya tam /
GK19gp01-11u:4640: ahaṃ pūrvam ahaṃ pūrvam iti saṃspṛśya remire //[BhP 10.12 /6] iti /
GK19gp01-11u:4643: vatsebhyaḥ preṣya sarvāṃ sakhitatim aghajid vīkṣituṃ vanya-lakṣmīṃ
GK19gp01-11u:4644: dūre' gād kṛṣṭa-dṛṣṭiḥ kramaśa iha tadā sā nivṛttā vidūrāt /
GK19gp01-11u:4654: tān nivārya svayaṃ bhṛṅgair jagus tadvat pikaiḥ pare //JGc_1,11.7// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:4659: kecid vāṃśa-naṭīṃ vidyām ātmano vyañjituṃ mudā /
GK19gp01-11u:4666: nudan bālān mudaṃ lebhe pratiśāpādito hariḥ //JGc_1,11.13// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:4671: [14] tad evaṃ līlām anyām api titaṃsati kaṃsa-dviṣi dīvyatsu ca sarva-kalā-vidvatsu
GK19gp01-11u:4672: visaraj-jāleṣu vatsa-pāleṣu bakī-bakayor anujaḥ kaścid agha-nāmā danujas tad-vartmani vartate sma,
GK19gp01-11u:4677: tvam ajagara-bhāvena sadā jāgara-rahita eva śāśayyamānatā-niṣṭhaṃ tiṣṭhan na jānāsīti hi tvaṃ jāgarayāmāsiṣe /
GK19gp01-11u:4683: iha ca rāvaṇasya kumbha ity ardhoktam aśakuna-bhiyācchādya,
GK19gp01-11u:4684: pūrveṣāṃ pūrva-devānāṃ vṛtra iva ity api pratyākhyāyedam ākhyat-dhruvaṃ dhruvasyeva tava cātra bhrātra-mitra-niryātanam avaśya-vaśyatām arhati iti /
GK19gp01-11u:4685: [17] tad evaṃ bhavya-prasavyam apy upalabhya sphuṭam asabhyatayā śīghram asau baka-bhrātṛkaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:4686: kṛṣṇa-bhrātṛkāṇāṃ teṣāṃ purataḥ pracaran pracura-tarāṅgam uraṅgam arūpam āsthāya sthitaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:4688: narmaṇā nāga-dharmatām upadiśadbhir amībhir ūce ca-
GK19gp01-11u:4690: samagraṃ grasitā tasmād asmān yadi bakiṣyati //JGc_1,11.15// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:4692: bāḍhaṃ kara-tāḍanāl lasanto hasanto mahā-giri-guhāntarvat tad-vaktrāntaraṃ praviviśur,
GK19gp01-11u:4694: yato mayūkhavat samagrā vatsāś ca tad-vartmāyacchanti sma;
GK19gp01-11u:4695: yatra niṣiṣitsann api śrīvatsa-lakṣmā nāvasaram avāpa,
GK19gp01-11u:4697: paścāt-tāpam āpad apy asau yena hi teṣāṃ vartmāpy anuvartamānas tatra praviveśa,
GK19gp01-11u:4699: [19] yatra murāri-prabhāvācaturāḥ surāḥ surārayaś ca muhur ārād ārād api hanta-hanta-kāraṃ cakruḥ;
GK19gp01-11u:4700: yatra ca teṣām ubhayeṣāṃ tat-tad-varṇataḥ samānam ānana-kula-yugalaṃ tat-tad-varṇataḥ kramād bhayaṃ vijayam udbhāvayāmāsa /
GK19gp01-11u:4701: [20] baka-ceṣṭām anutiṣṭhatas tasya tu pāpiṣṭhasya kaṇṭhe so' yam akuṇṭha-dhāmā kṛṣṇa-nāmā
GK19gp01-11u:4703: [21] sa tu jāta-śvāsa-rodhaḥ parityakta-bodhaś ca kṣaṇa-katipayam āsīt /
GK19gp01-11u:4704: tad-ūrdhvaṃ pāṭita-mūrdhānaṃ prāṇam apahāya pūtanā-śamayituḥ saṅgataḥ pūtaḥ pūtanā-bhrātur ātmā nitya-nūtanāṃ sad-gatim avāptum asya bahir āgamanaṃ pratīkṣate sma /
GK19gp01-11u:4705: [22] sa śrīvatsa-vatsas tu tam antar hatya vatsa-vatsapān mūrcchitān amṛta-vṛṣṭi-maya-dṛṣṭi-pracāreṇa
GK19gp01-11u:4706: sañcarita-cetanān ācarann amībhiḥ samaṃ gamana-vartmanā tasmān nirjagāma svar-bhānu-mukhād amṛta-bhānur iva /
GK19gp01-11u:4707: [23] tataś ca himācalād gāṅga-pravāhānām iva teṣāṃ pravahe jāte tasyātma-jyotir ajitasyāṅga-saṅghān niḥsajjad eva jagaj-janena dṛdaśe caṇḍa-jyotir-jyotiṣi jyotir iva /
GK19gp01-11u:4708: [24] yatra brahma-puraḥsarāḥ surāḥ sura-vartmani purataḥ sthitāḥ sura-taru-puṣpa-stavaka-vṛṣṭibhiḥ
GK19gp01-11u:4717: sarvāṃs tvaṃ kharva-koṭīḥ paśu-paśupa-śiśūn grastavān mām tathāpi
GK19gp01-11u:4718: grastaṃ nirmātum aiṣīr iti sukhadatayā prāpam antas tvadīyam /
GK19gp01-11u:4719: saṅkocād gantum icchan bahir atha bhujaga prāṇa-vargas tavāddhā
GK19gp01-11u:4720: man-nirbandho' pi mūrdhnaḥ sphuṭana-kṛtitayā dhig gataḥ kiṃ vidadhyām? //
GK19gp01-11u:4722: [25] tataś ca tasmāt kalita-gaṇatayā taruni-cayād ācita-kācita-divya-dīdivitayā cāticapalaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:4723: calitasya tasya kācanātidūrā bhūr āyata-vana-kalāpa-vimalāpasaro-varāntaratayā varāpy avaratām āsasāda /
GK19gp01-11u:4724: [26] yām upasādya ca sadyaḥ sukha-vikasita-mukha-paṅkajaḥ padma-locanaḥ svaṃ rocanaṃ vacana-gocaram ācacāra / yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:4738: vatsāḥ samīpe' paḥ pītvā carantu śanakais tṛṇam //[BhP 10.13 /6]
GK19gp01-11u:4739: [27] atha samaṃ bhūmisthitaṃ saṃyujya bhojana-jananārthaṃ racita-majjaneṣu kṛta-mithaḥ-sajjaneṣu teṣu suhṛj-janeṣu prathamatas tāvad evaṃ jātam
GK19gp01-11u:4744: [28] tataś ca tat-pālana-tṛṣṇena kṛṣṇena yatnena yojitabhojaneṣu savayojaneṣu kācid anyā śobhā dhanyāṃ tāṃ vanyāṃ śobhayāmāsa, yathā:
GK19gp01-11u:4751: tiṣṭhan madhye priya-savayasāṃ hāsayan hāsitas tair
GK19gp01-11u:4752: divye loke kalayati mudā bhuktavān bāla-kṛṣṇaḥ //
GK19gp01-11u:4754: [29] tad evaṃ paramotsva-rateṣu teṣu vatsāḥ kaccha-deśād anaccha-tārṇa-pradeśaṃ praviśya pracchannā babhūvuḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:4755: [30] pracchanneṣu ca teṣu vicchinna-bhojana-ratīr mitra-tatīḥ svasthayan tad-avastha
GK19gp01-11u:4756: eva svayaṃ nīrandhra-vanāvanīdhra-madhyam adhyāsitān avīdhra-durga-mārgān vicitya
GK19gp01-11u:4757: kṛtakṛtyatā-rāhityaṃ pratītya ca nivṛtya tatra ca mitra-vargān aparicitya vaicittya-vaśād
GK19gp01-11u:4758: ubhayān api sabhayān matvā vicikitsan vicikāya /
GK19gp01-11u:4759: kāya-kleśataḥ keśavaḥ so' yaṃ kintayā cintayāmāsa ca,
GK19gp01-11u:4760: aho, mātṝṇāṃ yac chiśu-kulam asubhyo' pi dayitaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:4762: tad etan mat-prāṇa-pratikṛti-śarīraṃ kva nu gataṃ
GK19gp01-11u:4763: yad arthaṃ duṣṭāher jaṭharam aviśaṃ hā viṣamayam //
GK19gp01-11u:4765: [31] tad etad aguṇa-guṇa-guṇagaṇa-nidhānasya tasya niravadhānam api na citram adhyasyati /
GK19gp01-11u:4766: [32] eṣa hi prema-maya-līlāveśa-vaśyatām āpannaḥ kadācid avaśyaṃ paśyann apaśyann iva bhavati /
GK19gp01-11u:4769: mama punar etāvantaṃ kālaṃ sañjaṅghanya-māna-sakhi-saṅgha-praṇayāsaṅga-vaśāl laṅghita-jñānatayā na tad-anusandhānaṃ jātam /
GK19gp01-11u:4771: kintu mayi prema-sthema-saṃhitasya tasya vraja-hitasya samprati mad-vaibhavaṃ prati viśeṣa-vīkṣā-pratīkṣā jātety evam evācaritam /
GK19gp01-11u:4772: yata eva khalu māyā-vaibhavatas tad ananya-sthāna-sthitaṃ-manyam evānyatra vanya-bhūmāv ākṛṣya punas tatraiva puline pratikṛṣya tat-tad-vṛndam
GK19gp01-11u:4776: tato vayaṃ bhakte tasmin narma-karmaṭhatām eva ghaṭayiṣyāmaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:4777: tatra ca prāyaḥ śrīmat-pitṛ-caraṇābhiprāya-mayatayā yā mama yogamāyā sāhāyakam āyāti /
GK19gp01-11u:4780: nānyad dhi mad-dhitānāṃ teṣāṃ sāmyaṃ bhajed iti-[33] yena ca śatānandasya vrajānandasya ca mandatā-mandatāṃ vindeta,
GK19gp01-11u:4785: kathaṃ tān māṃ vinā tāntān vinā samayaṃ gamayiṣyāmi?
GK19gp01-11u:4791: [34] iti tathānusandhāya svatas tat-tad-bālavatsādi-rūpāṇi sandhāya sarva-samādhāna-nirbandhāya
GK19gp01-11u:4792: dināntaravad eva vrajāgamana-devanena gehaṃ gehaṃ praveśam āsīnas tāṃ sandhyām abandhyāṃ cakāra /
GK19gp01-11u:4793: [35] tan-mātaras tu dināntarād apy antaraṅgataram ānandaṃ vindanti sma / tathā hi,
GK19gp01-11u:4797: tadīyā saṃsiddhir yad adhinuta tad bhāti tad iva //
GK19gp01-11u:4800: jātās tarhy apy amī tat-pratima-padam adhus tatra nety eva yuktam /
GK19gp01-11u:4801: tad-rūpaṃ tad-guṇālis tad-amita-vihṛtiś cāśrayaḥ khalv amīṣāṃ
GK19gp01-11u:4802: tasyāpi svasya citra-sthiti-kṛd iti yatas tatra tatrābhyadhāyi //
GK19gp01-11u:4804: [36] tad evaṃ hāna-prāyasya tasya hāyanasya pūraṇāya pañcaṣāṇy ahāni yadā hīnāni,
GK19gp01-11u:4805: tadā tu kṛṣṇa-viṣayaka-sneha-jātīya-sneham anu sva-para-tat-paratāyās teṣu bālādiṣu
GK19gp01-11u:4806: samyag avagamyamānatayā rāmo' pi vismitya tena saha praśnottare vinimitya viniścitya ca sthitavān,
GK19gp01-11u:4807: kintu teṣāṃ sakhīnām akhilānāṃ vipralambha-lambhita-kaṣṭena nijānuje ruṣṭatayā pañcaṣāṇy ahāni tena saha vanaṃ nājighāya /
GK19gp01-11u:4808: brahmā tu tatra guptam āgataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇena tarkyate sma, yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:4809: yasmād eti paraiti paśyati puraḥ paścāt tathā pārśvataḥ
GK19gp01-11u:4810: svātmānaṃ paritaḥ stṛṇoty anupadaṃ sambhrāmyati bhrāmyati /
GK19gp01-11u:4812: tasmān me pratibhāty asāv anudiśaṃ vaktraṃ dadhat stenakaḥ //JGc_1,11.28// [śārdūla]
GK19gp01-11u:4813: [37] atha brahmā teṣām arvācīnānāṃ prācīnānāṃ ca bālādīnāṃ rūpādibhiḥ parasparam abhedam ākalayya cetasāścaryam ācarya cārvācaḥ parivindan,
GK19gp01-11u:4815: [38] brahmāṇaṃ paśyati śrīdāmādi-mitre tu sva-mitrāṇām evānayanecchā jāteti yadṛcchayā tad-anveṣaṇāvasthā prādurbhūtā,
GK19gp01-11u:4817: [39] tad evaṃ nānā-vaibhavam anubhavataḥ kamala-bhavasya traptatayānutaptatayā ca yā racitāvācīnatā,
GK19gp01-11u:4818: sā svayaṃ praṇāmāya pariṇamati sma / tatra ca,
GK19gp01-11u:4819: ekam ekam adhaḥ kṛtvā mukhaṃ tatra caturmukhaḥ /
GK19gp01-11u:4821: yadyapi na naman mumude vidhir ekāsyānavāg-bhāvāt /
GK19gp01-11u:4823: [40] athāpakṛṣṭaṃ-manyaḥ sann ananya-gatitayā sumedhā vedhāḥ stavakeneva stavakeneṣṭavāṃś ca kṛṣṇam /
GK19gp01-11u:4824: yatra ca caturbhir vaktrair ānuvāna iva nuvann asau sarva-mahān api yat kiñcid gokulānugatānugatim eva prati nijānumatim ātatāna /
GK19gp01-11u:4826: tad bhūri bhāgyam iha janma kimapy aṭavyāṃ
GK19gp01-11u:4829: tv adyāpi yat-pada-rajaḥ śruti-mṛgyam eva //[BhP 10.14.34] iti /
GK19gp01-11u:4830: [41] tad evaṃ vraja-mahi-mahima-kara-kara-nikara-jaḍī-bhūtā vayaṃ nopapatti-pratyāsattiṃ labhāmaha ity alam ativistareṇa /
GK19gp01-11u:4831: [42] atha snigdhakaṇṭha uvāca-śrīmad-vraja-yuvarājena tatra kim uktam?
GK19gp01-11u:4835: dṛṣṭvā yat kim api dadarśa tatra citram /
GK19gp01-11u:4837: catvāro dadhati rutīr iti bhramaḥ syāt //
GK19gp01-11u:4840: vayaṃ gopāś cārthavanto brahmā ca tvam anarthavān /
GK19gp01-11u:4841: brūmas tvāṃ kim itīvāyam avadan smitam ātanot //JGc_1,11.32// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp01-11u:4842: [45] snigdhakaṇṭha uvāca-parisedhaty api vedhasi kiṃ kiñcid apy uktam?
GK19gp01-11u:4844: api paścād āvirbhūtavadbhir bālādibhiḥ paritoṣa-poṣam amanyamānaḥ sa dhanyaḥ svajana-prema-jitaḥ
GK19gp01-11u:4845: śrīmān ajitas tān vraja-bālādīn evānetuṃ yadā vāñchām ānañca,
GK19gp01-11u:4846: tadāñjali-bandha-vyañjitāṃ sañjñām anu samanujñāṃ yācamānaṃ viriñciṃ khalv evaṃ lambhita-tad-upālambha-narma-smitam anujñāpayāmāsa-yadi tatra-bhavatām ājñā vijñāyate,
GK19gp01-11u:4847: tadā tān pūrvam evānusaṃhitān sannihitān ānayāmi iti /
GK19gp01-11u:4848: [47] tataś ca viriñciḥ kiñcin namra-niṭilatā-ghaṭita-muni-vrata-sunirūpita-nija-durnītitayānujñāyāḥ karma-kartṛtvaṃ vyaktīkurvan,
GK19gp01-11u:4849: bhakti-bharāsakti-pṛktīkṛta-pulaka-saṅkulatayā svāparādha-maya-bādhā-vyakulatayā ca triḥ parikramya bahuśaḥ praṇamya ca nija-harmyam eva jagāma
GK19gp01-11u:4850: [48] śrī-kṛṣṇaś ca manasi tasyāparādhaṃ manāg apy anāgamayann āgamayamānaḥ prāg-diṣṭa-sadiṣṭa-dveṣa-veśa-kriyānatikrami-kramatayāvasthitāṃs
GK19gp01-11u:4852: [49] tathaiva hi teṣāṃ kāla-deśa-viparyayā paryālocanāya druhiṇa-devena sneha-dehany anavadya-vidyeyam udbhāvitā /
GK19gp01-11u:4855: vatsān pulinam āninye yathā pūrva-sakhaṃ svakam //[BhP 10.14.42] iti /
GK19gp01-11u:4862: darśayaṃś carmājagaraṃ nyavartata vanād vrajam //[BhP 10.14.45-46] iti /
GK19gp01-11u:4863: [51] carma cedam etāvantaṃ samayaṃ yathāvad eva yogamāyayāntardhāpitam iti gamyam /
GK19gp01-11u:4864: [52] tataś ca saṃvatsara-prasara-vatsa-vatsapāla-bāla-viraha-virahān mahatānandena mahitas tair eva sahitaḥ saṃhita-sampad-vrajaṃ vrajaṃ praviśan,
GK19gp01-11u:4866: pūrva-pūrvato' py apūrvaṃ parva parvati sma /
GK19gp01-11u:4872: [53] tataś ca pitṛ-sambandhibhir nanda-sūnur iti mātṛ-sambandhibhir yaśodā-sūnur iti tasya nāmānūdya,
GK19gp01-11u:4873: sadya eva siddham iti cirantanam api tac-caritaṃ jage / tad yathā-
GK19gp01-11u:4895: [54] iti śrutvā ca te vrajasthāś cintayāmāsuḥ,
GK19gp01-11u:4896: sādhu-ghātukānāṃ pātukānām āmīṣāṃ katham iva jātu kāmāḥ sidhyeyuḥ? iti /
GK19gp01-11u:4898: sukhānubiddhe teṣāṃ same samāgame prātas tu bṛhad-bhrātaram anugamya praṇaya-maya-ramya-roṣam
GK19gp01-11u:4899: anunīya dīyamāna-vismayatayā tān ānīya tena caikatra praṇīya śrīvatsa-vatsaḥ pūrvavad
GK19gp01-11u:4901: [56] atha punar madhukaṇṭhaḥ samāpanāya sa-vismayam ivāha sma-
GK19gp01-11u:4904: [57] tad evaṃ kathakayoḥ kathāṃ prathayitvā sabhyeṣu sākṣād iva kalita-tat-tat-keli-sandhayoḥ
GK19gp01-11u:4905: kṛtāñjali-bandhayos tad-dine' pi pūrvavad eva sarve gṛha-vartmani vartamānā nija-nija-spṛhaṇīyaṃ
GK19gp01-11u:4906: karma nirmimāṇā api tām eva līlāṃ bṛṃhitāṃ hṛdi jagṛhire /
